GV03sb_10_u:4: sa yaḥ sa prajāpatirvyasraṃsata saṃvatsaraḥ so'tha yānyasya tāni parvāṇi
GV03sb_10_u:7: sa yaḥ sa saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatirvyasraṃsata ayameva sa yo'yamagniścīyate'tha
GV03sb_10_u:8: yānyasya tānyahorātrāṇi parvāṇi vyasraṃsanteṣṭakā eva tāstadyadetā upadadhāti
GV03sb_10_u:12: atha yo'sya so'graṃ raso'gacat mahattadukthaṃ tamasya taṃ
GV03sb_10_u:13: rasamṛkṣāmābhyāmanuyanti tadyattatra yajuḥ purastādetyabhinetaiva tadeti yathādo
GV03sb_10_u:16: tamadhvaryurgraheṇa gṛhṇāti yadgṛhṇāti tasmādgrahastasmiadyajuḥ purastādeti taṃ
GV03sb_10_u:17: saṃvatsara āpnuvanti nnudgātā mahāvratena rasaṃ dadhāti sarvāṇi haitāni sāmāni
GV03sb_10_u:18: yanmahāvrataṃ tadasmintsarvaiḥ sāmabhī rasaṃ dadhāti tasminhotā mahatokthena
GV03sb_10_u:19: rasaṃ dadhāti sarvā haitā ṛco yanmahadukthaṃ tadasmintsarvābhirṛgbhī rasaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:22: te yadā stuvate yadānuśaṃsati athāsminnetaṃ vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti tadenameṣa
GV03sb_10_u:23: raso'pyeti na vai mahāvratamidaṃ stutaṃ śeta iti paśyanti no
GV03sb_10_u:25: bhūtvāpīta ṛkca sāma ca tadubhe ṛkṣāme yajurapītaḥ 10.1.1.[7]
GV03sb_10_u:27: sa eṣa mithuno'gniḥ prathamā ca citirdvitīyā ca tṛtīyā ca caturthī cātha pañcamyai
GV03sb_10_u:30: aṅguṣṭhā iti pumāṃsaḥ aṅgulaya iti striyaḥ karṇāviti pumāṃsau bhruvāviti striyā
GV03sb_10_u:31: oṣṭhāviti pumāṃsau nāsike iti striyau dantā iti pumāṃso jihveti strī sarva eva
GV03sb_10_u:34: eṣātrāpītiḥ apyahaivam mithuna itthaṃ ha tvevāpi mithuno vāgeveyaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:35: yo'yamagniścito vācā hi cīyate'tha yaścite'gnirnidhīyate sa prāṇaḥ prāṇo vai vāco vṛṣā
GV03sb_10_u:36: prāṇo mithunaṃ vāgvevāyamātmātha ya ātmanprāṇastanmithunaṃ so'nena
GV03sb_10_u:39: eṣo atrāpītiḥ na ha vā asyāputratāyai kā cana śaṅkā bhavati ya evametau
GV03sb_10_u:40: mithunāvātmānaṃ cāgniṃ ca vedānnaṃ ha tvevāyamātmā dakṣiṇānnaṃ vanute yo na
GV03sb_10_u:43: tadidamannaṃ jagdhaṃ dvedhā bhavati yadasyāmṛtamūrdhvaṃ tannābherūrdhvai
GV03sb_10_u:44: prāṇairuccarati tadvāyumapyetyatha yanmartyam parāk tannābhimatyeti taddvayam
GV03sb_10_u:45: bhūtvemāmapyeti mūtraṃ ca purīṣaṃ ca tadyadimāmapyeti yo'yamagniścitastaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:46: tadapyetyatha yadvāyumapyeti yaścite'gnirnidhīyate taṃ tadapyetyeṣo evātrāpītiḥ 10.1.2.[1]
GV03sb_10_u:48: prajāpatirimāṃlokānaipsat sa etaṃ vayovidhamātmānamapaśyadagniṃ taṃ vyadhatta
GV03sb_10_u:53: ayaṃ vāva loka eṣo'gniścitaḥ antarikṣam mahāvrataṃ dyaurmahadukthaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:54: tasmādetāni sarvāṇi sahopeyādagnim mahāvratam mahadukthaṃ saha hīme lokā
GV03sb_10_u:58: athādhyātmam mana evāgniḥ prāṇo mahāvrataṃ vāṅmahadukthaṃ tasmādetāni
GV03sb_10_u:59: sarvāṇi sahopeyātsaha hi manaḥ prāṇo vāktadyadagniḥ prathamaścīyate mano hi
GV03sb_10_u:62: ātmaivāgniḥ prāṇo mahāvrataṃ vāṅ mahadukthaṃ tasmādetāni sarvāṇi sahopeyātsaha
GV03sb_10_u:63: hyātmā prāṇo vāktadyadagniḥ prathamaścīyata ātmā hi prathamaḥ sambhavataḥ
GV03sb_10_u:66: śira evāgniḥ prāṇo mahāvratamātmā mahadukthaṃ tasmādetāni sarvāṇi sahopeyātsaha
GV03sb_10_u:67: hi śiraḥ prāṇa ātmā tadyadagniḥ prathamaścīyate śiro hi prathamaṃ jāyamānasya
GV03sb_10_u:68: jāyate tasmādyatraitāni sarvāṇi saha kriyante mahadevokthamātamāṃ khyāyata ātmā
GV03sb_10_u:71: tadāhuḥ yadetāni sarvāṇi saha durupāpāni kaiteṣāmupāptiriti jyotiṣṭoma
GV03sb_10_u:74: tasya vā etasya jyotiṣṭomasyāgniṣṭomasya trivṛdbahiṣpavamānaṃ tadvratasya śiraḥ
GV03sb_10_u:75: pañcadaśasaptadaśā uttarau pavamānau tau pakṣau pañcadaśaṃ hoturājyaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:79: pañcaviṃśa ātmātha yāḥ saptātiyanti tāḥ parimādaḥ paśavo haitāḥ paśavaḥ parimāda
GV03sb_10_u:82: atha hotā sapta candāṃsi śaṃsati caturuttarāṇyekarcāni virāḍaṣṭamāni teṣāṃ
GV03sb_10_u:85: mahadukthamākhyāyate'tha yāni pañcacatvāriṃśattato yāni pañcaviṃśatiḥ sa
GV03sb_10_u:86: pañcaviṃśa ātmā yatra vā ātmā tadeva śirastatpakṣapucānyatha yāni
GV03sb_10_u:88: vā etāni sarvāṇi jyotiṣṭoma evāgniṣṭoma āpyante tasmādu
GV03sb_10_u:91: prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata sa ūrdhvebhya eva prāṇebhyo devānasṛjata ye'vāñcaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:92: prāṇāstebhyo martyāḥ prajā athordhvameva mṛtyum prajābhyo'ttāramasṛjata 10.1.3.[2]
GV03sb_10_u:94: tasya ha prajāpateḥ ardhameva martyamāsīdardhamamṛtaṃ tadyadasya
GV03sb_10_u:95: martyamāsīttena mṛtyorabibhetsa bibhyādimām prāviśaddvayam bhūtvā mṛccāpaśca 10.1.3.[3]
GV03sb_10_u:97: sa mṛtyurdevānabravīt kva nu so'bhūdyo no'sṛṣṭeti tvadbibhyadimām prāvikṣaditi
GV03sb_10_u:98: so'bravīttaṃ vā anvicāma taṃ sambharāma na vā ahaṃ taṃ hiṃsiṣyāmīti taṃ devā asyā
GV03sb_10_u:99: adhi samabharanyadasyāpsvāsīttā apaḥ samabharannatha yadasyāṃ tām mṛdaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:103: tadetā vā asya tāḥ pañca martyāstanva āsaṃloma tvaṅmāṃsamasthi majjāthaitā amṛtā
GV03sb_10_u:106: sa yaḥ sa prajāpatiḥ ayameva sa yo'yamagniścīyate'tha yā asya tāḥ pañca
GV03sb_10_u:107: martyāstanva āsannetāstāḥ purīṣacitayo'tha yā amṛtā etāstā iṣṭakācitayaḥ 10.1.3.[6]
GV03sb_10_u:109: te devā abruvan amṛtamimaṃ karavāmeti tasyaitābhyāmamṛtābhyāṃ tanūbhyāmetām
GV03sb_10_u:110: martyāṃ tanūm parigṛhyāmṛtāmakurvanniṣṭakācitibhyām purīṣacitiṃ tathā dvitīyāṃ
GV03sb_10_u:113: atha pañcamīṃ citimupadhāya purīṣaṃ nivapati tatra vakarṇīṃ ca svayamātṛṇāṃ
GV03sb_10_u:120: te vai devāstaṃ nāviduḥ yadyenaṃ sarvaṃ vākurvanna vā sarvaṃ yadyati vārecayanna
GV03sb_10_u:122: sacetaso viśve devā yajñam prāvantu naḥ śubha iti 10.1.3.[9]
GV03sb_10_u:124: tasyā astyevāgneyam astyaindramasti vaiśvadevaṃ tadyadasyā āgneyaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:126: yadvaiśvadevaṃ tadvaiśvadevena tamatraiva sarvaṃ kṛtsnaṃ samaskurvan 10.1.3.[10]
GV03sb_10_u:128: tadyadetayopatiṣṭhate yadevāsyātra vidvānvāvidvānvāti vā recayati na vābhyāpayati
GV03sb_10_u:129: tadevāsyaitayā sarvamāpnoti yadasya kiṃ cānāptamanuṣṭubdhāmacadbhavati vāgvā
GV03sb_10_u:130: anuṣṭubvāgdhāmacadvācaivāsya tadāpnoti yadasya kiṃ cānāptam purīṣavatīṃ citiṃ
GV03sb_10_u:131: kṛtvopatiṣṭhetetyu haika āhustatra hisā sarvā kṛtsnā bhavatīti 10.1.3.[11]
GV03sb_10_u:133: tadu vā āhuḥ yaviṣṭhavatyaivopatiṣṭhetaitaddhāsya priyaṃ dhāma yadyaviṣṭha iti
GV03sb_10_u:134: tadyadasya priyaṃ dhāma tenāsya tadāpnoti yadasya kiṃ cānāptamāgneyyāgnikarma
GV03sb_10_u:135: hi gāyatryāgāyatro'gniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā tāvataivasya ta dāpnoti yadasya
GV03sb_10_u:136: kiṃ cānāptamaniruktayā sarvaṃ vā aniruktaṃ sarveṇaivāsya tadāpnoti yadasya kiṃ
GV03sb_10_u:137: cānāptaṃ tvaṃ yaviṣṭha dāśuṣa iti tasyokto bandhuḥ purīṣavatīṃ citiṃ
GV03sb_10_u:138: kṛtvopatiṣṭheta tatra hi sā sarvā kṛtsnā bhavati 10.1.4.[1]
GV03sb_10_u:140: ubhayaṃ haitadagre prajāpatirāsa martyaṃ caivāmṛtaṃ ca tasya prāṇā evāmṛtā āsuḥ
GV03sb_10_u:142: tathaivaitadyajamāna ubhayameva bhavati martyaṃ caivāmṛtaṃ ca tasya prāṇā evāmṛtā
GV03sb_10_u:143: bhavanti śarīram martyaṃ sa etena karmaṇaitayāvṛtaikadhājaramamṛtamātmānaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:146: sa prathamāṃ citiṃ cinoti sā hāsyaiṣā prāṇa eva tadvai tadamṛtamṛtaṃ hi prāṇaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:147: saiṣāmṛtacitiratha purīṣaṃ nivapati taddhāsyaitanmajjaiva tadvai tanmartyam
GV03sb_10_u:148: martyo hi majjā tadetasminnamṛte pratiṣṭhāpayati tenāsyaitadamṛtam bhavati 10.1.4.[3]
GV03sb_10_u:150: dvitīyāṃ citiṃ cinoti sā hāsyaiṣāpāna eva tadvai tadamṛtamamṛtaṃ hyapānaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:152: bhavatyatha purīṣaṃ nivapati taddhāsyaitadasthyeva tadvai tanmartyam martyaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:155: tṛtīyāṃ citiṃ cinoti sā hāsyaiṣā vyāna eva tadvai tadamṛtamamṛtaṃ hi vyānaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:157: bhavatyatha purīṣaṃ nivapati taddhāsyaitatsnāvaiva tadvai tanmartyaṃ hi snāva
GV03sb_10_u:160: caturthīṃ citiṃ cinoti sā hāsyaiṣodāna eva tadvai tadamṛtamamṛtam hyudānaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:162: bhavatyatha purīṣaṃ nivapati taddhāsyaitanmāṃsameva tadvai tanmartyam martyaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:163: hi māṃsaṃ tadetasminnamṛte pratiṣṭhāpayati tenāsyaitadamṛtam bhavati 10.1.4.[6]
GV03sb_10_u:165: pañcamīṃ citiṃ cinoti sā hāsyaiṣā samāna eva tadvai tadamṛtamamṛtaṃ hi samānaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:167: bhavatyatha purīṣaṃ nivapati taddhāsyaitanmeda eva tadvai tanmartyam martyaṃ hi
GV03sb_10_u:170: ṣaṣṭhīṃ citiṃ cinoti sā hāsyaiṣā vāgevatadvai tadamṛ tamamṛtaṃ hi
GV03sb_10_u:172: bhavatyatha puriṣaṃ nivapati taddhāsyaitadasṛgeva tvageva tadvai tanmartyam
GV03sb_10_u:176: tā vā etāḥ ṣaḍiṣṭakācitayaḥ ṣaṭ purīṣacitayastaddvādaśa dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ
GV03sb_10_u:181: atha vikarṇīṃ ca svayamātṛṇāṃ copadhāya hiraṇyaśakalaiḥ
GV03sb_10_u:185: tadyadantatastasmādidamantyamātmano rūpaṃ tasmādye caitadvidurye ca na
GV03sb_10_u:189: rūpamevāsyaitaditi ha smāha śāṇḍilyo lomānīti sāptarathavāhaniḥ 10.1.4.[11]
GV03sb_10_u:191: sa hovāca śāṇḍilyaḥ rūpaṃ vāva lomavadrūpamalomakaṃ rūpamevāsyaitaditi tadvai
GV03sb_10_u:192: tattathā yathā tacāṇḍilya uvāca saṃcite'gniḥ praṇīyate praṇītādūrdhvaṃ samidha
GV03sb_10_u:195: prāṇena vai devā annamadanti agniru devānām prāṇastasmātprāgdevebhyo juhvati
GV03sb_10_u:196: prāṇena hi devā annamadantyapānena manuṣyā annamadanti
GV03sb_10_u:199: tadāhuḥ na vayaso'gnicidaśnīyādvayo vā eṣa rūpam bhavati yo'gniṃ cinuta īśvara
GV03sb_10_u:201: eṣa rūpam bhavati yo'gniṃ cinute sarvaṃ vā idamagnerannaṃ sarvam ma
GV03sb_10_u:204: tadāhuḥ kiṃ tadagnau kriyate yena yajamānaḥ punarmṛtyumapajayatītyagnirvā eṣa
GV03sb_10_u:205: devatā bhavati yo'gniṃ cinute'mṛtamu vā agniḥ śrīrdevāḥ śriyaṃ gacati yaśo devā yaśo
GV03sb_10_u:208: sarve haite yajñā yo'yamagniścitaḥ sa yatpaśumālabhate tadagnyādheyamatha
GV03sb_10_u:212: te vai sāyamprātarādadhāti sāyamprātarhyagnihotrāhutī juhvati samānena mantreṇa
GV03sb_10_u:213: samānena hi mantreṇāgnihotrāhutī juhvatyatha yadvanīvāhanaṃ ca
GV03sb_10_u:214: bhasmanaścābhyavaharaṇaṃ tau darśapūrṇamāsāvatha yadgārhapatyaṃ cinoti tāni
GV03sb_10_u:215: cāturmāsyānyatha yadūrdhvaṃ gārhapatyādā sarvauṣadhāttā iṣṭayo'tha yadūrdhvaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:216: sarvauṣadhātprācīnaṃ citibhyaste paśubandhā ya evaiteṣu yajñeṣu viṣṇukramāste
GV03sb_10_u:219: saumyo'dhvaraḥ prathamā citiḥ yatprācīnaṃ savebhyo rājasūyo dvitīyā
GV03sb_10_u:222: mahadukthamatha yadūrdhvaṃ sāmabhyaḥ prācīnaṃ vasordhārāyai yadeva tatra hotuḥ
GV03sb_10_u:223: purastājjapyaṃ tattadatha yadūrdhvaṃ vasordhārāyai te gṛhamedhā etāvanto vai sarve
GV03sb_10_u:226: athāto yajñavīryāṇāmeva sāyamprātarha vā amuṣmiṃloke'gnihotrahudaśnāti tāvatī
GV03sb_10_u:228: māseṣu cāturmāsyayājī ṣaṭsu-ṣaṭsu paśubandhayājī saṃvatsare-saṃvatsare somayājī
GV03sb_10_u:234: prajāpatiḥ svargaṃ lokamajigāṃsat sarve vai paśavaḥ prajāpatiḥ puruṣo'śvo
GV03sb_10_u:235: gauravirajaḥ sa etai rūpairnāśaknotsa etaṃ vayovidhamātmānamapaśyadagniṃ taṃ
GV03sb_10_u:240: taṃ vā aṅgulibhirmimīte puruṣo vai yajñastenedaṃ sarvam mitaṃ tasyaiṣāvamā
GV03sb_10_u:241: mātrā yadaṅgulayastadyāsyāvamā mātrā tāmasya tadāpnoti tayainaṃ tanmimīte 10.2.1.[3]
GV03sb_10_u:247: vyudūhati tadyāvadevopasamūhati tāvadvyudūhati tannāhaivātirecayati no kanīyaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:250: atha nirṇāmau pakṣayoḥ karoti nirṇāmau hi vayasaḥ pakṣayorbhavato vitṛtīye
GV03sb_10_u:251: vitṛtīye hi vayasaḥ pakṣayornirṇāmau bhavato'ntare vitṛtīye'ntare hi vitṛtīye vayasaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:252: pakṣayornirṇāmau bhavataḥ sa caturaṅgulameva purastādudūhati caturaṅgulam
GV03sb_10_u:256: sa tasminnirṇāme ekāmiṣṭakāmupadadhāti tadyeyaṃ vayasaḥ patato nirṇāmādekā
GV03sb_10_u:259: atha vakrau karoti vakrau hi vayasaḥ pakṣau bhavataḥ sa caturaṅgulameva
GV03sb_10_u:263: atha rūpamūttamaṃ karoti atraiṣa sarvo'gniḥ saṃskṛtastasmindevā
GV03sb_10_u:267: atha pañcamīṃ citimupadhāya tredhāgniṃ vimimīte sa madhyame vitṛtīye
GV03sb_10_u:268: sahasramṛjvālikhitā iṣṭakā upadadhāti tadyānīmāni vayasaḥ pratyañci śīrṣṇa ā
GV03sb_10_u:271: atha sahasramityālikhitā dakṣiṇata upadadhāti tadyānīmāni vayaso dakṣiṇato
GV03sb_10_u:274: atha sahasramityālikhitā uttarata upadadhāti tadyānīmāni vayasa uttarato vakrāṇi
GV03sb_10_u:275: lomāni tāni tatkaroti sahasreṇa sarvaṃ vai sahasraṃ
GV03sb_10_u:280: yānvai tāntsapta puruṣān ekam puruṣamakurvantsa prajāpatirabhavatsa prajā
GV03sb_10_u:281: asṛjata sa prajāḥ sṛṣṭvordhva udakrāmatsa etaṃ lokamagacadyatraiṣa etattapati no
GV03sb_10_u:282: ha tarhyanya etasmādatra yajñiya āsa taṃ devā yajñenaiva yaṣṭumadhriyanta 10.2.2.[2]
GV03sb_10_u:284: tasmādetadṛṣiṇābhyanūktam yajñena yajñamayajanta devā iti yajñena hi taṃ
GV03sb_10_u:285: yajñamayajanta devāstāni dharmāṇi prathamānyāsanniti te hi dharmāḥ
GV03sb_10_u:286: prathame'kriyanta te ha nākam mahimānaḥ sacanteti svargo vai loko nāko devā
GV03sb_10_u:287: mahimānaste devāḥ svargaṃ lokaṃ sacanta ye taṃ yajñamayajannityetat 10.2.2.[3]
GV03sb_10_u:289: yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devā iti prāṇā vai sādhyā devāsta etamagra
GV03sb_10_u:294: suparṇo aṅgaṃ saviturgarutmān pūrvo jātaḥ sa u asyānu dharmeti prajāpatirvai
GV03sb_10_u:297: sa vai saptapuruṣo bhavati saptapuruṣo hyayam puruṣo yaccatvāra ātmā trayaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:298: pakṣapucāni catvāro hi tasya puruṣasyātmā trayaḥ pakṣapucāni 10.2.2.[6]
GV03sb_10_u:300: taṃ vā udbāhunā puruṣeṇa mimīte puruṣo vai yajñastenedaṃ sarvam mitaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:301: tasyaiṣā paramā mātrā yadudbāhustadyāsya paramā mātrā tāmasya tadāpnoti
GV03sb_10_u:302: tayainaṃ tanmimīte tatropa yatprapadenābhyucrito bhavati tatpariśridbhirāpnoti
GV03sb_10_u:305: atha pakṣayoraratnī upādadhāti pakṣayostadvīryaṃ dadhāti bāhū vai pakṣau
GV03sb_10_u:306: bāhubhyāmu vā annamadyate'nnāyaiva tamavakāśāṃ karoti tadyatpakṣayoraratnī
GV03sb_10_u:309: atha puce vitastimupādadhāti pratiṣṭhāyāṃ tadvīryaṃ dadhāti pratiṣṭhā vai pucaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:310: hasto vitastirhastena vā annamadyate'nnāyaiva tamavakāśaṃ karoti tadyatpuce
GV03sb_10_u:315: yā vā iyaṃ vediḥ saptavidhasya eṣā vedermātrā sa devayajanamadhyavasāya pūrvayā
GV03sb_10_u:317: prācaḥ prakramānprakrāmati tataḥ prāñcaṃ vyāmaṃ vimimīte tasya madhya
GV03sb_10_u:322: te vā ete vyāmaikādaśāḥ prakramā antarā vedyantaṃ ca gārhapatyaṃ caikādaśākṣarā
GV03sb_10_u:326: saiṣā vederyoniḥ etasyai vai yonerdevā vedim prājanayannatha ya eṣa vyāmaḥ sā
GV03sb_10_u:330: sa vedyantāt ṣaṭtriṃśatprakramām prācīṃ vediṃ vimimīte triṃśatam paścāttiraścīṃ
GV03sb_10_u:331: caturviṃśatim purastāttannavatiḥ saiṣā navatiprakramā vedistasyāṃ saptavidhamagniṃ
GV03sb_10_u:334: tadāhuḥ kathameṣa saptavidha etayā vedyā sampadyata iti daśa vā ime puruṣe
GV03sb_10_u:335: prāṇāścatvāryaṅgānyātmā pañcadaśa evaṃ dvitīya evaṃ tṛtīye ṣaṭsu puruṣeṣu
GV03sb_10_u:336: navatirathaikaḥ puruṣo'tyeti pāṅkto vai puruṣo loma tvaṅmāṃsamasthi majjā pāṅkto
GV03sb_10_u:337: iyaṃ vediścatasro diśa ātmā pañcamyevameṣa saptavidha etayā vedyā sampadyate 10.2.3.[6]
GV03sb_10_u:339: taddhaike uttarā vidhā vidhāsyanta etāṃśca prakramānetaṃ ca
GV03sb_10_u:340: vyāmamanuvardhayanti yonimanuvardhayāma iti na tathā kuryānna vai jātaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:341: garbhaṃ yoniranuvardhate yāvadvāva yonāvantargarbho bhavati tāvadeva
GV03sb_10_u:342: yonirvardhata etāvatyu vā atra garbhasya vṛddhiḥ 10.2.3.[7]
GV03sb_10_u:344: te ye ha tathā kurvanti etaṃ ha te pitaram prajāpatiṃ sampadaścyāvayanti ta iṣṭvā
GV03sb_10_u:345: pāpīyāṃso bhavanti pitaraṃ hi prajāpatiṃ sampadaścyāvayanti sā yāvatyeṣā
GV03sb_10_u:346: saptavidhasya vedistāvatīṃ caturdaśa kṛtva ekaśatavidhasya vediṃ vimimīte 10.2.3.[8]
GV03sb_10_u:348: atha ṣaṭtriṃśatprakramāṃ rajjum mimīte tāṃ saptadhā samasyati tasyai
GV03sb_10_u:351: atha triṃśatprakramām mimīte tāṃ saptadhā samasyati tasyai
GV03sb_10_u:354: atha caturviṃśatiprakramām mimīte tāṃ saptadhā samasyati tasyai
GV03sb_10_u:355: trīnbhāgānpurastādupadadhāti niḥsṛjati catura iti nu vedivimānam 10.2.3.[11]
GV03sb_10_u:357: athāgnervidhāḥ aṣṭāviṃśatiḥ prāñcaḥ puruṣā aṣṭāviṃśatistiryañcaḥ sa ātmā caturdaśa
GV03sb_10_u:359: pakṣa upadadhāti caturdaśottare caturdaśa vitastīḥ puca iti nvaṣṭānavateḥ
GV03sb_10_u:362: atha tripuruṣāṃ rajjum mimīte tāṃ saptadhā samasyati tasyai caturo
GV03sb_10_u:365: athāratnimātrīm mimīte tāṃ saptadhā samasyati tasyai trīnbhāgāndakṣiṇe pakṣa
GV03sb_10_u:368: atha vitastimātrīm mimīte tāṃ saptadhā samasyati tasyai trīnbhāgānpuca upadadhāti
GV03sb_10_u:369: niḥsṛjati catura evameṣa ekaśatavidha etayā vedyā sampadyate 10.2.3.[15]
GV03sb_10_u:371: tadāhuḥ yattrayodaśa puruṣā atiyanti kathamete sampado na cyavanta iti yā vā
GV03sb_10_u:372: etasya saptamasya puruṣasya sampatsaivaiteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ sampat 10.2.3.[16]
GV03sb_10_u:374: atho āhuḥ prajāpatirevātmānaṃ vidhāya tasya yatra-yatra nyūnamāsīttadetaiḥ
GV03sb_10_u:380: saptavidho vā agre prajāpatirasṛjyata sa ātmānaṃ vidadhāna aitsa
GV03sb_10_u:381: ekaśatavidhe'tiṣṭhata sa yo'rvācīnaṃ saptavidhādvidhatta etaṃ ha sa pitaram
GV03sb_10_u:382: prajāpatiṃ vicinatti sa iṣṭvā pāpīyānbhavati yathā śreyāṃsaṃ hiṃsitvātha sa
GV03sb_10_u:386: pitaram prajāpatiṃ vicinatti no asmātsarvasmādbahirdhā niṣpadyate 10.2.4.[1]
GV03sb_10_u:388: saṃvatsaro vai prajāpatiḥ agniru sarve kāmāḥ so'yaṃ saṃvatsaraḥ
GV03sb_10_u:390: vyadhatta sa ekaśatadhātmānaṃ vidhāyāgniṃ sarvānkāmānātmānamabhisamacinuta sa
GV03sb_10_u:391: sarve kāmā abhavattasmānna kaścana bahirdhā kāmo'bhavattasmādāhuḥ saṃvatsaraḥ
GV03sb_10_u:392: sarve kāmā iti na ha saṃvatsarātkaścana bahirdhā kāmo'sti 10.2.4.[2]
GV03sb_10_u:395: sarvānkāmānātmānamabhisaṃcinute sa sarve kāmā bhavati tasmānna kaścana
GV03sb_10_u:398: sa yaḥ sa saṃvatsaro'sau sa ādityaḥ sa eṣa ekaśatavidhastasya raśmayaḥ śataṃ vidhā
GV03sb_10_u:402: atha vā ekaśatavidhaḥ saptavidhamabhisampadyata ekaśatadhā vā asāvādityo vihitaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:403: saptasu devalokeṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ sapta vai devalokāścatasro diśastraya ime lokā ete
GV03sb_10_u:407: yadvevaikaśatavidhaḥ saptavidhamabhisampadyata ekaśatadhā vā asāvādityo vihitaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:408: saptasvṛtuṣu saptasu stomeṣu saptasu pṛṣṭheṣu saptasu candaḥsu saptasu prāṇeṣu
GV03sb_10_u:412: yadvevaikaśatavidhaḥ saptavidhamabhisampadyata ekaśatadhā vā asāvādityo vihitaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:413: saptākṣare brahmanpratiṣṭhitaḥ saptākṣaraṃ vai brahmargityekamakṣaraṃ yajuriti
GV03sb_10_u:414: dve sāmeti dve atha yadato'nyadbrahmaiva taddvyakṣaraṃ vai brahma tadetatsarvaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:421: saptavidho vā agre prajāpatirasṛjyata sa etamekaśatadhātmānaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:422: vihitamapaśyatprāṇabhṛtsu pañcāśadiṣṭakāḥ pañcāśadyajūṃṣi tacataṃ sādanaṃ ca
GV03sb_10_u:423: sūdadohāścaika=\atatame tatsamānaṃ sādayitvā hi sūdadohasādhivadati sa
GV03sb_10_u:426: vyaśnuta evamu saptavidha ekaśatavidhamabhisampadyate sa ya evaikaśatavidhaḥ sa
GV03sb_10_u:427: saptavidho yaḥ saptavidhaḥ sa ekaśatavidha iti nu vidhānam 10.2.5.[1]
GV03sb_10_u:429: athātaścayanasyaiva antaropasadau cinotyetadvai devā abibhayuryadvai na imamiha
GV03sb_10_u:430: rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā na hanyuriti ta etāḥ puro'paśyannupasada imāneva lokānime vai
GV03sb_10_u:431: lokāḥ purastāḥ prāpadyanta tāḥ prapadyābhaye'nāṣṭra etamātmānaṃ samaskurvata
GV03sb_10_u:432: tathaivaitadyajamāna etāḥ puraḥ prapadyābhaye'nāṣṭra etamātmānaṃ saṃskurute 10.2.5.[2]
GV03sb_10_u:434: yadvevāntaropasadau cinoti etadvai devā abibhayuryadvai na imamiha rakṣāṃsi
GV03sb_10_u:435: nāṣṭrā na hanyuriti ta etānvajrānapaśyannupasado vajrā vā upasadastānprāpadyanta
GV03sb_10_u:439: etadu ha yajñe tapaḥ yadupasadastapo vā upasadastadyattapasi cīyate
GV03sb_10_u:443: ahorātrāṇi vā upasadaḥ ādityaḥ pravargyo'muṃ tadādityamahorātreṣu
GV03sb_10_u:446: atha yadi caturviṃśatiḥ caturviṃśatirvā ardhamāsā ardhamāsā upasada ādityaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:450: atha yadi dvādaśa dvādaśa vai māsā māsā upasada ādityaḥ pravargyo'muṃ
GV03sb_10_u:451: tadādityam māseṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati tasmādeṣa māseṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ 10.2.5.[7]
GV03sb_10_u:453: atha yadi ṣaṭ ṣaḍvā ṛtava ṛtava upasada ādityaḥ pravargyo'muṃ tadādityamṛtuṣu
GV03sb_10_u:456: atha yadi tisraḥ trayo vā ime lokā ime lokā upasada ādityaḥ pravargyo'muṃ
GV03sb_10_u:457: tadādityameṣu lokeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati tasmādeṣa eṣu lokeṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ 10.2.5.[9]
GV03sb_10_u:463: māsaṃ dvitīyā māsam purīṣametāvāngraiṣma ṛtau kāmastadyāvāngraiṣma ṛtau
GV03sb_10_u:466: māsaṃ tṛtīyā māsam purīṣametāvānvārṣika ṛtau kāmastadyāvānvārṣika ṛtau
GV03sb_10_u:469: māsaṃ caturthī māsam purīṣametāvāñcārada ṛtau kāmastadyāvāñcārada ṛtau
GV03sb_10_u:472: atha pañcamyai citeḥ asapatnā virājaśca prathamāhamupadadhāti stomabhāgā
GV03sb_10_u:473: ekaikāmanvahaṃ tāḥ skṛtsādayati sakṛtsūdadohasādhivadati tūṣṇīm māsaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:477: māsaṃ ṣaṣṭhī māsam purīṣametāvāñcaiśira ṛtau kāmastadyāvāñcaiśira ṛtau
GV03sb_10_u:478: kāmastaṃ tatsarvamātmānamabhisaṃcinuta etāvānvai dvādaśasu māseṣu kāmaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:479: ṣaṭsvṛtuṣu tadyāvāndvādaśasu māseṣu kāmaḥ ṣaṭsvṛtuṣu taṃ
GV03sb_10_u:482: atha trīṇyahānyupātiyanti yadahaḥ śatarudriyaṃ juhoti yadaharupavasatho yadahaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:485: māseṣu kāmaḥ saptasvṛtuṣu tadyāvāṃstrayodaśasu māseṣu kāmaḥ saptasvṛtuṣu taṃ
GV03sb_10_u:488: sa saṃvatsaram prasutaḥ syāt sarvaṃ vai saṃvatsaraḥ sarvamekaśatavidhaḥ sarveṇaiva
GV03sb_10_u:489: tatsarvamāpnoti yadi saṃvatsaraṃ na śaknuyādviśvajitā sarvapṛṣṭhenātirātreṇa yajeta
GV03sb_10_u:493: saṃvatsaro vai prajāpatirekaśatavidhaḥ tasyāhorātrāṇyardhamāsā māsā ṛtavaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:495: caturviṃśatirardhamāsāstrayodaśa māsāstraya ṛtavastāḥ śataṃ vidhāḥ saṃvatsara
GV03sb_10_u:498: sa ṛtubhireva saptavidhaḥ ṣaḍṛtavaḥ saṃvatsara eva saptamī vidhā tasyaitasya
GV03sb_10_u:499: saṃvatsarasyaitattejo ya eṣa tapati tasya raśmayaḥ śataṃ vidhā
GV03sb_10_u:502: sa digbhireva saptavidhaḥ ye prācyāṃ diśi raśmayaḥ saikā vidhā ye dakṣiṇāyāṃ saikā
GV03sb_10_u:503: ye pratīcyāṃ saikā ya udīcyāṃ saikā ya ūrdhvāyāṃ saikā ye'vācyāṃ saikā maṇḍalameva
GV03sb_10_u:506: tasyaitasya purastātkāmapro lokaḥ amṛtaṃ vai kāmapramamṛtamevāsya
GV03sb_10_u:509: tadetadvasucitraṃ rādhaḥ tadeṣa savitā vibhaktābhyaḥ prajābhyo
GV03sb_10_u:510: vibhajatyapyoṣadhibhyo'pi vanaspatibhyo bhūya-iva ha tvekābhyaḥ prayacati kanīya
GV03sb_10_u:511: ivaikābhyastadyābhyo bhūyaḥ prayacati tā jyoktamāṃ jīvanti yābhyaḥ kanīyaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:514: tadetadṛcābhyuktaṃ vibhaktāraṃ havāmahe vasościtrasya rādhasaḥ savitāraṃ
GV03sb_10_u:516: āyurastu sarvamāyurihītyeṣa te loka etatte'stviti haivaitat 10.2.6.[7]
GV03sb_10_u:518: paśyantī vāgvadati tadetadekaśatavidhena vaivāptavyaṃ śatāyutayā vā ya
GV03sb_10_u:519: evaikaśatavidhaṃ vidhatte yo vā śatam- varṣāṇi jīvati sa haivaitadamṛtamāpnoti
GV03sb_10_u:520: tasmādye caitadvidurye ca na lokyā śatāyutetyevāhustasmādu ha na purāyuṣaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:521: svakāmī preyādalokyaṃ haita u vāva lokā yadahorātrāṇyardhamāsā māsā ṛtavaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:524: tadye'rvāgviṃśeṣu varṣeṣu prayanti ahorātreṣu te lokeṣu sajyante'tha ye
GV03sb_10_u:527: te'tha ye paro'śīteṣvarvākśateṣu saṃvatsare te'tha ya eva śataṃ varṣāṇi yo vā
GV03sb_10_u:530: bahubhirha vai yajñaiḥ ekamaharekā rātrirmitā sa ya evaikaśatavidhaṃ vidhatte yo
GV03sb_10_u:531: vā śataṃ varṣāṇi jīvati sa haivainadaddhātamāmāpnotyeṣa vā ekaśatavidhaṃ vidhatte
GV03sb_10_u:532: ya enaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ bibharti tasmādenaṃ saṃvatsarabhṛtameva cinvītetyadhidevatam 10.2.6.[10]
GV03sb_10_u:537: sa u vā iṣṭakaikaśatavidhaḥ yāḥ pañcāśatprathamā iṣṭakā yāścottamāstāḥ śataṃ
GV03sb_10_u:538: vidhā atha yā etadantareṇeṣṭakā upadhīyante saivaikaśatatamī vidhā 10.2.6.[12]
GV03sb_10_u:540: sa u eva yajustejāḥ yajurekaśatavidho yāni pañcāśatprathamāni yajūṃṣi yāni
GV03sb_10_u:541: cottamāni tāḥ śataṃ vidhā atha yānyetadantareṇa yajūṃṣi kriyante saivaikaśatatamī
GV03sb_10_u:542: vidhaivamu saptavidha ekaśatavidho bhavati sa yaḥ śatāyutāyāṃ kāmo ya
GV03sb_10_u:546: evaṃ vāva sarve yajñāḥ ekaśatavidhā āgnihotrādṛgbhiryajurbhiḥ padairakṣaraiḥ
GV03sb_10_u:547: karmabhiḥ sāmabhiḥ sa yaḥ śatāyutāyāṃ kāmo ya ekaśatavidhe yaḥ saptavidhe yajñena
GV03sb_10_u:550: athādhyātmam pañcemāścaturvidhā aṅgulayo dve kalkuṣī doraṃsaphalakaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:551: cākṣaśca tatpañcaviṃśatirevamimānītarāṇyaṅgāni tāḥ śataṃ vidhā ātmaivaikaśatatamī
GV03sb_10_u:554: sa u eva prāṇatejāḥ prāṇaikaśatavidho'nvaṅgamaṅge'ṅge hi prāṇaḥ sa yaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:556: kāmo ya ekaśatavidhe yaḥ saptavidhe yaḥ sarveṣu yajñeṣu vidyāyā haiva
GV03sb_10_u:559: trīṇi vā imāni pañcavidhāni saṃvatsaro'gniḥ puruṣasteṣām pañca vidhā annam
GV03sb_10_u:560: pānaṃ śrīrjyotiramṛtaṃ yadeva saṃvatsare'nnaṃ tadannaṃ yā āpastatpānaṃ rātrireva
GV03sb_10_u:564: athādhiyajñam yadevāgnāvannamupadhīyate tadannaṃ yā āpastatpānam pariśrita eva
GV03sb_10_u:565: śrīstaddhi rātrīṇāṃ rūpaṃ yajuṣmatyo jyotistaddhyahnāṃ rūpamagniraṃ/taṃ
GV03sb_10_u:568: athādhyātmam yadeva puruṣe'nnaṃ tadannaṃ yā āpastatpānamasthīnyeva śrīstaddhi
GV03sb_10_u:569: pariśritāṃ rūpam majjāno jyotistaddhi yajuṣmatīnāṃ rūpam prāṇo'mṛtaṃ taddhyagne
GV03sb_10_u:572: annādvā aśanāyā nivartate pānātpipāsā śriyai pāpmā jyotiṣastamo'mṛtānmṛtyurni ha
GV03sb_10_u:573: vā asmādetāni sarvāṇi vartante'pa punarmṛtyuṃ jayati sarvamāyureti ya evaṃ veda
GV03sb_10_u:574: tadetadamṛtamityevāmutropāsītāyuritīha prāṇa iti haika upāsate prāṇo'gniḥ
GV03sb_10_u:575: prāṇo'mṛtamiti vadanto na tathā vidyādadhruvaṃ vai tadyatprāṇastaṃ te
GV03sb_10_u:579: prāṇo gāyatrī cakṣuruṣṇigvāganuṣṭummano bṛhatī śrotram paṅktirya evāyam
GV03sb_10_u:580: prajananaḥ prāṇa eṣa triṣṭubatha yo'yamavāṅ prāṇa eṣa jagatī tāni vā etāni sapta
GV03sb_10_u:583: prāṇo gāyatrīti tadya eva prāṇasya mahimā yadvīryaṃ tadetatsahasram
GV03sb_10_u:584: prāṇasyaivaitadvīryaṃ yaddhyasya cinvataḥ prāṇa utkkāmettata evaiṣo'gnirna
GV03sb_10_u:585: cīyetaitenaivāsya rūpeṇa sahasrameṣa gāyatrīḥ saṃcito bhavati 10.3.1.[3]
GV03sb_10_u:587: cakṣuruṣṇigiti tadya eva cakṣuṣo mahimā yadvīryaṃ tadetatsahasraṃ cakṣuṣa
GV03sb_10_u:589: cīyetaitenaivāsya rūpeṇa sahasrameṣa uṣṇihaḥ saṃcito bhavati 10.3.1.[4]
GV03sb_10_u:591: vāganuṣṭubiti tadya eva vāco mahimā yadvīryaṃ tadetatsahasraṃ vāca evaitadvīryaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:592: yaddhyasya cinvato vāgutkrāmettata evaiṣo'gnirna cīyetaitenaivāsya rūpeṇa
GV03sb_10_u:595: mano bṛhatīti tadya eva manaso mahimā yadvīryaṃ tadetatsahasram manasa
GV03sb_10_u:596: evaitadvīryaṃ yaddhyasya cinvato mana utkrāmettata evaiṣo'gnirna cīyetaitenaivāsya
GV03sb_10_u:599: śrotram paṅktiriti tadya eva śrotrasya mahimā yadvīryaṃ tadetatsahasraṃ
GV03sb_10_u:601: cīyetaitenaivāsya rūpeṇa sahasrameṣa paṅktīḥ saṃcito bhavati 10.3.1.[7]
GV03sb_10_u:603: ya evāyam prajananaḥ prāṇaḥ eṣa triṣṭubiti tadya evaitasya prāṇasya mahimā
GV03sb_10_u:604: yadvīryaṃ tadetatsahasrametasyaivaitatprāṇasya vīryaṃ yaddhyasya cinvata eṣa prāṇa
GV03sb_10_u:605: ālubhyettata evaiṣo'gnirna cīyetaitenaivāsya rūpeṇa sahasrameṣa triṣṭubhaḥ saṃcito
GV03sb_10_u:608: atha yo'yamavāṅ prāṇaḥ eṣa jagatīti tadya evaitasya prāṇasya mahimā yadvīryaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:609: tadetatsahasrametasyaivaitatprāṇasya vīryaṃ yaddhyasya cinvata eṣa pralṇa
GV03sb_10_u:610: ā6ubhyettata evaiṣo'gnirna cīyetaitenaivāsya rūpeṇa sahasrameṣa jagatīḥ saṃcito
GV03sb_10_u:613: tāni vā etāni sapta candāṃsi caturuttarāṇyanyo'nyasminpratiṣṭhitāni sapteme puruṣe
GV03sb_10_u:615: candasaścandaso haivāsya so'nūkto bhavati stuto vā śasto vopahito vā 10.3.2.[1]
GV03sb_10_u:617: tadāhuḥ kiṃ candaḥ kā devatāgneḥ śira iti gāyatrī cando'gnirdevatā śiraḥ 10.3.2.[2]
GV03sb_10_u:619: kiṃ candaḥ kā devatā grīvā ityuṣṇikcandaḥ savitā devatā grīvāḥ 10.3.2.[3]
GV03sb_10_u:621: kiṃ candaḥ kā devatānūkamiti bṛhatī cando bṛhaspatirdevatānūkam 10.3.2.[4]
GV03sb_10_u:623: kiṃ candaḥ kā devatā pakṣāviti bṛhadrathantare cando dyāvāpṛthivī devate pakṣau 10.3.2.[5]
GV03sb_10_u:625: kiṃ candaḥ kā devatā madhyamiti triṣṭupcanda indro devatā madhyam 10.3.2.[6]
GV03sb_10_u:627: kiṃ candaḥ kā devatā śroṇī iti jagatī canda ādityo devatā śro ṇī 10.3.2.[7]
GV03sb_10_u:629: kiṃ candaḥ kā devatā yasmādidam prāṇādretaḥ sicyata ityaticandāścandaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:632: kiṃ candaḥ kā devatā yo'yamavāṅ prāṇa iti yajñāyajñiyaṃ cando vaiśvānaro devatā 10.3.2.[9]
GV03sb_10_u:634: kiṃ candaḥ kā devatorū ityanuṣṭupcando viśve devā devatorū 10.3.2.[10]
GV03sb_10_u:636: kiṃ candaḥ kā devatāṣṭhīvantāviti paṅktiścando maruto devatāṣṭhīvantau 10.3.2.[11]
GV03sb_10_u:638: kiṃ candaḥ kā devatā pratiṣṭhe iti dvipadā cando viṣṇurdevatā pratiṣṭhe 10.3.2.[12]
GV03sb_10_u:640: kiṃ candaḥ kā devatā prāṇā iti vicandāścando vāyurdevatā prāṇāḥ 10.3.2.[13]
GV03sb_10_u:642: kiṃ candaḥ kā devatonātiriktānīti nyūnākṣarā canda āpo devatonātiriktāni
GV03sb_10_u:643: saiṣātmavidyaivaitanmayo haivaitā devatā etamātmānamabhisambhavati na hātrānyā
GV03sb_10_u:646: dhīro ha śātaparṇeyaḥ mahāśālaṃ jābālamupotsasāda taṃ hovāca kim mā
GV03sb_10_u:647: vidvānupodasada ityagniṃ vedeti kamagniṃ vettheti vācamiti yastamagniṃ veda kiṃ
GV03sb_10_u:648: sa bhavatīti vāgmī bhavatīti hovāca nainaṃ vāgjahātīti 10.3.3.[2]
GV03sb_10_u:650: vetthāgnimiti hovāca kimeva mā vidvānupodasada ityagniṃ vedeti kamagniṃ vettheti
GV03sb_10_u:651: cakṣuriti yastamagniṃ veda kiṃ sa bhavatīti cakṣuṣmānbhavatīti hovāca nainaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:654: vetthāgnimiti hovāca kimeva mā vidvānupodasada ityagniṃ vedeti kamagniṃ vettheti
GV03sb_10_u:655: mana iti yastamagniṃ veda kiṃ sa bhavatīti manasvī bhavatīti hovāca nainam mano
GV03sb_10_u:658: vetthāgnimiti hovāca kimeva mā vidvānupodasada ityagniṃ vedeti kamagniṃ vettheti
GV03sb_10_u:659: śrotramiti yastamagniṃ veda kiṃ sa bhavatīti śrotravānbhavatīti hovāca nainaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:662: vetthāgnimiti hovāca kimeva mā vidvānupodasada ityagniṃ vedeti kamagniṃ vettheti
GV03sb_10_u:663: ya etatsarvamagnistaṃ vedeti tasminhokta upāvarurohādhīhi bhostamagnimiti 10.3.3.[6]
GV03sb_10_u:665: sa hovāca prāṇo vāva so'gniryadā vai puruṣaḥ svapiti prāṇaṃ tarhi vāgapyeti prāṇaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:666: cakṣuḥ prāṇam manaḥ prāṇaṃ śrotraṃ yadā prabudhyate prāṇādevādhi punarjāyanta
GV03sb_10_u:669: athādhidevatam yā vai sā vāgagnireva sa yattaccakṣurasau sa ādityo yattanmana eṣa
GV03sb_10_u:670: sa candramā yattacrotraṃ diśa eva tadatha yaḥ sa prāṇo'yameva sa vāyuryo'yam
GV03sb_10_u:673: yadā vā agniranugacati vāyuṃ tarhyanūdvāti tasmādenamudavāsīdityāhurvāyuṃ
GV03sb_10_u:674: hyanūdvāti yadādityo'stameti vāyuṃ tarhi praviśati vāyuṃ candramā vāyau diśaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:676: vācaivāgnimapyeti cakṣuṣādityam manasā candraṃ śrotreṇa diśaḥ prāṇena vāyuṃ sa
GV03sb_10_u:677: etanmaya eva bhūtvaitāsāṃ devatānāṃ yāṃ-yāṃ kāmayate sā bhūtvelayati 10.3.4.[1]
GV03sb_10_u:679: śvetaketurhāruṇeyaḥ yakṣyamāṇa āsa taṃ ha pitovāca kānṛtvijo'vṛthā iti sa hovācāyaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:680: nveva me vaiśvāvasavyo hoteti taṃ ha papraca vettha brāhmaṇa vaiśvāvasavya 10.3.4.[2]
GV03sb_10_u:682: catvāri mahāntī3 iti veda bho3 iti hovāca vettha catvāri mahatām mahāntī3 iti veda
GV03sb_10_u:683: bho3 iti hovoca vettha catvāri vratāni3 iti veda bho3 iti hovāca vettha catvāri vratānāṃ
GV03sb_10_u:684: vratānī3 iti veda bho3 iti hovāca vettha catvāri kyānī3 iti veda bho3 iti hovāca vettha
GV03sb_10_u:685: catvāri kyānāṃ kyānī3 iti veda bho3 iti hovāca vettha caturo'rkā3niti veda bho3 iti
GV03sb_10_u:686: hovāca vettha caturo'rkāṇāmarkā3niti veda bho3 iti hovāca 10.3.4.[3]
GV03sb_10_u:688: vetthārkamiti atha vai no bhavānvakṣyatīti vetthārkaparṇe ityatha vai no
GV03sb_10_u:689: bhavānvakṣyatīti vetthārkapuṣpe ityatha vai no bhavānvakṣyatīti
GV03sb_10_u:690: vetthārkakośyāvityatha vai no bhavānvakṣyatīti vetthārkasamudgāvityatha vai no
GV03sb_10_u:691: bhavānvakṣyatīti vetthārkadhānā ityatha vai no bhavānvakṣyatīti
GV03sb_10_u:692: vetthārkāṣṭhīlāmityatha vai no bhavānvakṣyatīti vetthārkamūlamityatha vai no
GV03sb_10_u:695: sa ha vai yattaduvāca vettha catvāri mahānti vettha catvāri mahatām
GV03sb_10_u:698: mahāṃstasya mahato mahaccandramāstaddhyasyānnam puruṣo mahāṃstasya mahato
GV03sb_10_u:700: mahāntyetānyeva catvāri vratānyetāni catvāri vratānāṃ vratānyetānyeva catvāri
GV03sb_10_u:701: kyānyetāni catvāri kyānāṃ kyānyeta eva catvāro'rkā ete catvāro'rkāṇāmarkāḥ 10.3.4.[5]
GV03sb_10_u:703: atha ha vai yattaduvāca vetthārkamiti puruṣaṃ haiva taduvāca vetthārkaparṇe iti
GV03sb_10_u:704: karṇau haiva taduvāca vetthārkapuṣpe ityakṣiṇī haiva taduvāca vetthārkakośyāviti
GV03sb_10_u:705: nāsike haiva taduvāca vetthārkasamudgāvityoṣṭhau haiva taduvāca vetthārkadhānā
GV03sb_10_u:706: iti dantānhaiva taduvāca vetthārkāṣṭhīlāmiti jihvāṃ haiva taduvāca
GV03sb_10_u:707: vetthārkamūlamityannaṃ haiva taduvāca sa eṣo'gnirarko yatpuruṣaḥ sa yo
GV03sb_10_u:711: ayaṃ vāva yajuryo'yam pavate eṣa hi yannevedaṃ sarvaṃ janayatyetaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:715: tadetadyajurvāyuścāntarikṣaṃ ca yacca jūśca tasmādyajureṣa eva yadeṣa hyeti
GV03sb_10_u:720: agnireva puraḥ agniṃ hi puraskṛtyemāḥ prajā upāsata āditya eva caraṇaṃ yadā
GV03sb_10_u:721: hyevaiṣa udetyathedaṃ sarvaṃ carati tadetadyajuḥ sapuraścaraṇamadhidevataṃ 10.3.5.[4]
GV03sb_10_u:723: athādhyātmam prāṇa eva yajuḥ prāṇo hi yannevedaṃ sarvaṃ janayati prāṇaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:726: ayamevākāśo jūḥ yo'yamantarātmannākāśa etaṃ hyākāśamanu javate tadetadyajuḥ
GV03sb_10_u:727: prāṇaścākāśaśca yacca jūśca tasmādyajuḥ prāṇa eva yatprāṇo hyeti 10.3.5.[6]
GV03sb_10_u:729: annameva yajuḥ annena hi jāyate'nnena javate tadetadyajuranne pratiṣṭhitamannaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:732: mana eva puraḥ mano hi prathamam prāṇānāṃ cakṣureva caraṇaṃ cakṣuṣā
GV03sb_10_u:733: hyayamātmā carati tadetadyajuḥ sapuraścaraṇamadhidevataṃ cādhyātmaṃ ca
GV03sb_10_u:734: pratiṣṭhitaṃ sa yo haitadevaṃ yajuḥ sapuraścaraṇamadhidevataṃ cādhyātmaṃ ca
GV03sb_10_u:737: ariṣṭo haivānārtaḥ svasti yajñasyodṛcamaśnute svānāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ puraetā
GV03sb_10_u:740: ya u haivaṃvidaṃ sveṣu pratipratirbubhūṣati na haivālam bhāryebhyo bhavatyatha
GV03sb_10_u:741: ya evaitamanubhavati yo vai tamanu bhāryānbubhūrṣati sa haivālam bhāryebhyo
GV03sb_10_u:744: tadetajjyeṣṭham brahma na hyetasmātkiṃ cana jyāyo'sti jyeṣṭho ha vai śreṣṭhaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:747: tadetadbrahmāpūrvamaparavat sa yo haitadevam brahmāpūrvamaparavadveda na
GV03sb_10_u:748: hāsmātkaścana śreyāntmamāneṣu bhavati śreyāṃsaḥ śreyāṃso haivāsmādaparapuruṣā
GV03sb_10_u:749: jāyante tasmādyo'smājjyāyāntsyāddiśo'smātpūrvā ityupāsīta tatho hainaṃ na hinasti 10.3.5.[12]
GV03sb_10_u:751: tasya vā etasya yajuṣaḥ rasa evopaniṣattasmādyāvanmātreṇa yajuṣādhvaryurgrahaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:752: gṛhṇāti sa ubhe stutaśastre anuvibhavatyubhe stutaśastre anuvyaśnute
GV03sb_10_u:755: tṛptirevāsya gatiḥ tasmādyadānnasya tṛpyatyatha sa gata iva manyata ānanda evāsya
GV03sb_10_u:756: vijñānamātmānandātmāno haiva sarve devāḥ sā haiṣaiva devānāmaddhāvidyā sa ha sa
GV03sb_10_u:758: na manuṣyo ya evaṃviddevānāṃ haiva sa ekaḥ 10.3.5.[14]
GV03sb_10_u:760: etaddha sma vai tadvidvānpriyavrato rauhiṇāyana āha vāyuṃ vāntamānandasta
GV03sb_10_u:761: ātmeto vā vāhito veti sa ha sma tathaiva vāti tasmādyāṃ
GV03sb_10_u:762: deveṣvāśiṣamicedetenaivopatiṣṭhetānando va ātmāsau me kāmaḥ sa me
GV03sb_10_u:763: samṛdhyatāmiti saṃ haivāsmai sa kāma ṛdhyate yatkāmo bhavatyetāṃ ha vai
GV03sb_10_u:766: tadetadyajurupāṃśvaniruktam prāṇo vai yajurupāṃśvāyatano vai prāṇastadya enaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:767: nirbruvantam brūyādaniruktāṃ devatāṃ niravocatprāṇa enaṃ hāsyatīti tathā haiva syāt 10.3.5.[16]
GV03sb_10_u:769: tasya ha yo niruktamāvirbhāvaṃ veda āvirbhavati kīrtyā yaśasopāṃśu
GV03sb_10_u:770: yajuṣādhvaryurgrahaṃ gṛhṇāti gṛhītaḥ sanna āvirbhavatyupāṃśu yajuṣāgniṃ cinoti
GV03sb_10_u:771: citaḥ saṃcita āvirbhavatyupāṃśu yajuṣā havirnirvapati śṛtaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:772: niṣṭhitamāvirbhavatyevaṃ yatkiṃ copāṃśu karoti kṛtaṃ niṣṭhitamāvirbhavati tasya
GV03sb_10_u:773: ha ya etamevaṃ niruktamāvirbhāvaṃ vedāvirbhavati kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena
GV03sb_10_u:774: kṣipra u haivāvidaṃ gacati sa ha yajureva bhavati yajuṣainamācakṣate 10.4.1.[1]
GV03sb_10_u:776: prajāpatiṃ visrastam yatra devāḥ samaskurvaṃstamukhāyāṃ yonau reto
GV03sb_10_u:781: tathaivaitadyajamānaḥ ātmānamukhāyāṃ yonau reto bhūtaṃ siñcati yonirvā ukhā
GV03sb_10_u:783: tadātmanā parihitamātmaiva bhavati tasmādannamātmanā parihitamātmaiva bhavati 10.4.1.[3]
GV03sb_10_u:785: taṃ nidadhāti vauṣaḍiti vaugiti vā eṣa ṣaḍitīdaṃ ṣaṭcitikamannaṃ kṛtvāsmā
GV03sb_10_u:786: apidadhātyātmasammitaṃ yadu vā ātmasammitamannaṃ tadavati tanna hinasti
GV03sb_10_u:790: yo'yamagniścitastadarkyaṃ yajuṣṭa eṣa eva mahāṃstasyaitadannaṃ vrataṃ
GV03sb_10_u:791: tanmahāvrataṃ sāmata eṣa u evoktasyaitadannaṃ thaṃ tadukthamṛktastadetadekaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:794: athendrāgnī vā asṛjyetām brahma ca kṣatraṃ cāgnireva brahmendraḥ kṣatraṃ tau
GV03sb_10_u:795: sṛṣṭau nānaivāstāṃ tāvabrūtāṃ na vā itthaṃ santau śakṣyāvaḥ prajāḥ
GV03sb_10_u:798: tau yau tāvindrāgnī etau tau rukmaśca puruṣaśca rukma evendraḥ puruṣo'gnistau
GV03sb_10_u:799: hiraṇmayau bhavato jyotirvai hiraṇyaṃ jyotirindrāgni/ amṛtaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:802: tāvetāvindrāgnī eva cinvanti yaddhi kiṃ caiṣṭakamagnireva tattasmāttadagninā
GV03sb_10_u:803: pacanti yaddhi kiṃ cāgninā pacantyagnireva tadatha yatpurīṣaṃ sa
GV03sb_10_u:804: indrastasmāttadagninā na pacanti nedagnirevāsannendra iti tasmādetāvindrāgnī eva
GV03sb_10_u:814: devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtānyabhisampadyante tadetadbrahma ca kṣatraṃ cāgnireva
GV03sb_10_u:815: brahmendraḥ kṣatramindrāgnī vai viśve devā viḍu viśve devāstadetadbrahma
GV03sb_10_u:818: etaddha sma vai tadvidvāñcyāparṇaḥ sāyakāyana āha yadvai ma idaṃ karma
GV03sb_10_u:819: samāpsyata mamaiva prajā salvānāṃ rājāno'bhaviṣyanmama brāhmaṇā mama vaiśyā
GV03sb_10_u:820: yattu ma etāvatkarmaṇaḥ samāpi tena ma ubhayathā salvānprajātirekṣyata iti sa eṣa
GV03sb_10_u:823: etaddha vai tacāṇḍilyaḥ vāmakakṣāyaṇāya procyovāca śrīmānyaśasvyannādo
GV03sb_10_u:824: bhaviṣyasīti śrīmānha vai yaśasvyannādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda 10.4.1.[12]
GV03sb_10_u:826: sa eṣo'gniḥ prajāpatireva ta devā etamagnim prajāpatiṃ saṃskṛtyāthāsmā
GV03sb_10_u:830: rasaṃ dadhāti sarvāṇi haitāni sāmāni yanmahāvrataṃ tadasmintsarvaiḥ sāmabhī rasaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:831: dadhāti tasminhotā mahatokthena rasaṃ dadhāti sarvā haitā ṛco yanmahadukthaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:834: te yadā stuvate yadānuśaṃsati athāsminnetaṃ vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti vaugiti vā eṣa
GV03sb_10_u:835: ṣaḍitīdaṃ ṣaḍvidhamannaṃ kṛtvāsmā apidadhātyātmasammitaṃ yadu vā
GV03sb_10_u:836: ātmasammitamannaṃ tadavati tanna hinasti yadbhūyo hinasti tadyatkanīyo na
GV03sb_10_u:839: sa eṣa evārkaḥ yo'yamagniścitastasyaitadannaṃ kyameṣa mahāvratīyo
GV03sb_10_u:840: grahastadarkyaṃ yajuṣṭa eṣa eva mahāṃstasyaitadannaṃ vrataṃ tanmahāvrataṃ
GV03sb_10_u:841: sāmata eṣa u evoktadannaṃ thaṃ tadukthamṛktastadetadekaṃ sattredhākhyāyate 10.4.1.[16]
GV03sb_10_u:843: sa eṣa saṃvatsaraḥ prājāpatiragniḥ tasyārdhameva sāvitrāṇyardhaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:845: yadetadantareṇa karma kriyate sa eva saptadaśaḥ prajāpatiryo vai kalā
GV03sb_10_u:848: tadvai lometi dve akṣare tvagiti dve asṛgiti dve meda iti dve māṃsamiti dve snāveti
GV03sb_10_u:849: dve asthīti dve majjeti dve tāḥ ṣoḍaśa kalā atha ya etadantareṇa prāṇaḥ saṃcarati sa
GV03sb_10_u:852: tasmā etasmai prāṇāya etāḥ ṣoḍaśa kalā annamabhiharanti tā yadānabhihartuṃ
GV03sb_10_u:853: dhriyante'thaitā eva jagdhvotkrāmati tasmādu haitadaśiśiṣatastṛpramiva bhavati
GV03sb_10_u:854: prāṇairadyamānasya tasmādu haitadupatāpī kṛśa-iva bhavati prāṇairhi jagdho bhavati 10.4.1.[19]
GV03sb_10_u:856: tasmā etasmai saptadaśāya prajāpataye etatsaptadaśamannaṃ samaskurvanya eṣa
GV03sb_10_u:857: saumyo'dhvaro'tha yā asya tāḥ ṣoḍaśa kalā ete te ṣoḍaśartvijastasmānna
GV03sb_10_u:858: saptadaśamṛtvijaṃ kurvīta nedatirecayānītyatha ya evātra raso yā āhutayo hūyante
GV03sb_10_u:861: te yadā stuvate yadānuśaṃsati athāsminnetaṃ vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti vaugiti vā eṣa
GV03sb_10_u:862: ṣaḍitīdaṃ ṣaḍvidhamannaṃ kṛtvāsmā apidadhātyātmasammitaṃ yadu vā
GV03sb_10_u:863: ātmasammitamannaṃ tadavati tanna hinasti yadbhūyo hinasti tadyatkanīyo na
GV03sb_10_u:866: sa eṣa evārkaḥ yo'yamagniścitastasyaitadannaṃ kyameṣa saumyo'dhvarastadarkyaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:867: yajuṣṭa eṣa eva mahāṃstasyaitadannaṃ vrataṃ tanmahāvrataṃ sāmata eṣa u
GV03sb_10_u:869: etenānnena sahordhva udakrāmatsa yaḥ sa udakrāmadasau sa ādityo'tha yena
GV03sb_10_u:872: sa eṣa evārko ya eṣa tapati tasyaitadannaṃ kyameṣa candramāstadarkyaṃ yajuṣṭa
GV03sb_10_u:873: eṣa eva mahāṃstasyaitadannaṃ vrataṃ tanmahāvrataṃ sāmata eṣa u
GV03sb_10_u:877: athādhyātmam prāṇo vā arkastasyānnameva kyaṃ tadarkyaṃ yajuṣṭaḥ prāṇa eva
GV03sb_10_u:878: māhāṃstasyānnameva vrataṃ tanmahāvrataṃ sāmataḥ prāṇa u evoktasyānnameva thaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:882: saṃvatsaro vai prajāpatiragniḥ somo rājā candramāḥ sa ha svayamevātmānam proce
GV03sb_10_u:883: yajñavacase rājastambāyanāya yāvanti vāva me jyotīṃṣi tāvatyo ma iṣṭakā iti 10.4.2.[2]
GV03sb_10_u:885: tasya vā etasya saṃvatsarasya prajāpateḥ sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiścāhorātrāṇi jyotīṃṣi tā
GV03sb_10_u:886: iṣṭakāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatāṇi pariśritaḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatāni yajuṣmatyaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:887: so'yaṃ saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni sasṛje yacca prāṇi
GV03sb_10_u:888: yaccāprāṇamubhayāndevamanuṣyāntsa sarvāṇi bhūtāni sṛṣṭvā riricāna-iva mene sa
GV03sb_10_u:891: sa hekṣāṃ cakre kathaṃ nvahamināni sarvāṇi bhūtāni punarātmannāvapeya
GV03sb_10_u:892: punarātmandadhīya kathaṃ nvahamevaiṣāṃ sarveṣām bhūtānām punarātmā syāmiti 10.4.2.[4]
GV03sb_10_u:894: sa dvedhātmānaṃ vyauhat ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatānyanyatarasyeṣṭakā
GV03sb_10_u:897: trīnātmano'kuruta tisrastisro'śītaya ekaikasyeṣṭakā abhavantsa naiva vyāpnot 10.4.2.[6]
GV03sb_10_u:901: pañcātmano'kuruta catuścatvāriṃśaṃ śatamekaikasyeṣṭakā abhavantsa naiva vyāpnot 10.4.2.[8]
GV03sb_10_u:903: ṣaḍātmano'kuruta viṃśatiśateṣṭakāntsa naiva vyāpnonna saptadhā vyabhavat 10.4.2.[9]
GV03sb_10_u:911: dvādaśātmano'kuruta ṣaṣṭīṣṭakāntsa naiva vyāpnonna trayodaśadhā vyabhavanna
GV03sb_10_u:919: aṣṭādaśātmano'kuruta catvāriṃśadiṣṭakāntsa naiva vyāśnonnaikāṃ na viṃśatidhā
GV03sb_10_u:932: trāyante tasmānmuhurtā atha yatkṣudrāḥ santa imāṃlokānāpūrayanti
GV03sb_10_u:935: eṣa vā idaṃ sarvam pacati ahorātrairardhamāsairmāsairṛtubhiḥ saṃvatsareṇa
GV03sb_10_u:936: tadamunā pakvamayam pacati pakvasya pakteti ha smāha bhāradvājo'gnimamunā hi
GV03sb_10_u:939: tāni saṃvatsare daśa ca sahasrāṇyaṣṭau ca śatāni samapadyanta so'trātiṣṭhata daśasu
GV03sb_10_u:942: atha sarvāṇi bhūtāni paryaikṣat sa trayyāmeva vidyāyāṃ sarvāṇi bhūtānyapaśyadatra
GV03sb_10_u:943: hi sarveṣāṃ candasāmātmā sarveṣāṃ stomānāṃ sarveṣām prāṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ
GV03sb_10_u:946: sa aikṣata prajāpatiḥ trayyāṃ vāva vidyāyāṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni hanta trayomeva
GV03sb_10_u:949: sa ṛco vyauhat dvādaśa bṛhatīsahasrāṇyetāvatyo harco yāḥ
GV03sb_10_u:954: athetarau vedau vyauhat dvādaśaiva bṛhatīsahasrāṇyaṣṭau yajuṣāṃ catvāri
GV03sb_10_u:957: rātrayo'tha yatpaṅktiṣu tasmātpāṅktaḥ prajāpatistā aṣṭāśatameva śatāni
GV03sb_10_u:960: te sarve trayo vedāḥ daśa ca sahasrāṇyaṣṭau ca śatānyaśītonāmabhavantsa
GV03sb_10_u:963: sa es-u triṣu lokeṣūkhāyām yonau reto bhūtamātmānamasiñcaccandomayaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:964: stomamayam prāṇamayaṃ devatāmayaṃ tasyārdhamāse prathama ātmā samaskriyata
GV03sb_10_u:965: davīyasi paro davīyasi paraḥ saṃvatsara eva sarvaḥ kṛtsnaḥ samaskriyata 10.4.2.[27]
GV03sb_10_u:971: bhūtānāmātmābhavaccandomaya stomamayaḥ prāṇamayo devatāmayaḥ sa etanmaya
GV03sb_10_u:972: eva bhūtvordhva udakrāmatsa yaḥ sa udakrāmadeṣa sa candramāḥ 10.4.2.[28]
GV03sb_10_u:977: sa yadagniṃ ceṣyamāṇo dīkṣate yathaiva tatprajāpatireṣu triṣu lokeṣūkhāyāṃ
GV03sb_10_u:978: yonau reto bhūtamātmānamasiñcadevamevaiṣa etadātmānamukhāyāṃ yonau reto
GV03sb_10_u:979: bhūtaṃ siñcati candomayaṃ stomamayam prāṇamayaṃ devatāmayaṃ tasyārdhamāse
GV03sb_10_u:980: prathama ātmā saṃskriyate davīyasi paro davīyasi paraḥ saṃvatsara eva sarvaḥ kṛtsnaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:986: trayīṃ vidyāmātmannāvapata ātmankurute so'traiva sarveṣām bhūtānāmātmā bhavati
GV03sb_10_u:987: candomaya stomamayaḥ prāṇamayo devatāmayaḥ sa etanmaya eva bhūtvordhva
GV03sb_10_u:990: tasyaiṣā pratiṣṭhā ya eṣa tapatyetasmādvevādhicīyata etasminnadhicīyata ātmana
GV03sb_10_u:993: prāṇamayaṃ devatāmayaṃ sa etanmaya eva bhūtvordhva utkrāmati ya evaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:996: eṣa vai mṛtyuryatsaṃvatsaraḥ eṣa hi martyānāmahorātrābhyāmāyuḥ kṣiṇotyatha
GV03sb_10_u:997: mriyante tasmādeṣa eva mṛtyuḥ sa yo haitam mṛtyuṃ saṃvatsaraṃ veda na hāsyaiṣa
GV03sb_10_u:1000: eṣa u evāntakaḥ eṣa hi martyānāmahorātrābhyāmāyuṣo'ntaṃ gacatyatha mriyante
GV03sb_10_u:1001: tasmādeṣa evāntakaḥ sa yo haitamantakam mṛtyuṃ saṃvatsaraṃ veda na hāsyaiṣa
GV03sb_10_u:1007: ta etānyajñakratūṃstenire agnihotraṃ darśapūrṇamāsau cāturmāsyāni paśubandhaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1010: te hāpyagniṃ cikyire te'parimitā eva pariśrita upadadhuraparimitā
GV03sb_10_u:1014: te'rcantaḥ śrāmyantaśceruḥ amṛtatvamavarurutsamānāstānha prajāpatiruvāca na vai
GV03sb_10_u:1015: me sarvāṇi rūpāṇyupadhatthāti vaiva recayatha na vābhyāpayatha tasmānnāmṛtā
GV03sb_10_u:1018: te hocuḥ tebhyo vai nastvameva tadbrūhi yathā te sarvāṇi rūpāṇyupadadhāmeti 10.4.3.[8]
GV03sb_10_u:1020: sa hovāca ṣaṣṭiṃ ca trīṇi ca śatāni pariśrita upadhatta ṣaṣṭiṃ ca trīṇi ca śatāni
GV03sb_10_u:1021: yajuṣmatīradhi ṣaṭtriṃśatamatha lokampṛṇā daśa ca sahasrāṇyaṣṭau ca
GV03sb_10_u:1022: śatānyupadhattātha me sarvāṇi rūpāṇyupadhāsyathāthāmṛtā bhaviṣyatheti te ha tathā
GV03sb_10_u:1025: sa mṛtyurdevānabravīt itthameva sarve manuṣyā amṛtā bhaviṣyantyatha ko
GV03sb_10_u:1026: mahyam bhāgo bhaviṣyatīti te hocurnāto'paraḥ kaścana saha
GV03sb_10_u:1027: śarīreṇāmṛto'sadyadaiva tvametam bhāgaṃ harāsā atha vyāvṛtya
GV03sb_10_u:1028: śarīreṇāmṛto'sadyo'mṛto'sadvidyayā vā karmaṇā veti yadvai tadabruvanvidyayā vā
GV03sb_10_u:1029: karmaṇā vetyeṣā haiva sā vidyā yadagniretadu haiva tatkarma yadagniḥ 10.4.3.[10]
GV03sb_10_u:1031: te ya evametadviduḥ ye vaitatkarma kurvate mṛtvā punaḥ sambhavanti te
GV03sb_10_u:1032: sambhavanta evāmṛtatvamabhisambhavantyatha ya evaṃ na vidurye vaitatkarma na
GV03sb_10_u:1033: kurvate mṛtvā punaḥ sambhavanti ta etasyaivānnam punaḥ-punarbhavanti 10.4.3.[11]
GV03sb_10_u:1035: sa yadagniṃ cinute etameva tadantakam mṛtyuṃ saṃvatsaram prajāpatimagnimāpnoti
GV03sb_10_u:1036: yaṃ devā āpnuvannetamupadhatte yathaivainamado devā upādadhata 10.4.3.[12]
GV03sb_10_u:1041: tadyāḥ pariṣritaḥ rātrilokāstā rātrīṇāmeva sāptiḥ kriyate rātrīṇām pratimā tāḥ
GV03sb_10_u:1042: ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca ha vai trīṇi ca śatāni saṃvatsarasya
GV03sb_10_u:1043: rātrayastāsāmekaviṃśatiṃ gārhapatye pariśrayati dvābhyāṃ nāśītiṃ dhiṣṇyeṣu dve
GV03sb_10_u:1046: atha yajuṣmatyaḥ darbhastambo logeṣṭakāḥ puṣkaraparṇaṃ rukmapuruṣau srucau
GV03sb_10_u:1047: svayamātṛṇā dūrveṣṭakā dviyajū retaḥsicau viśvajyotirṛtavye aṣāḍhā kūrma
GV03sb_10_u:1048: ulūkhalamusale ukhā pañca paśuśīrṣaṇi pañcadaśāpasyāḥ pañca candasyāḥḥ 10.4.3.[15]
GV03sb_10_u:1050: atha dvitīyā pañcāśvinyo dve ṛtavye pañca vaiśvadevyaḥ pañca prāṇabhṛtaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:1051: pañcāpasyā ekayā na viṃśatirvayasyāstā ekacatvāriṃśaddvitīyā citiḥ 10.4.3.[16]
GV03sb_10_u:1053: atha tṛtīyā svayamātṛṇā pañca diśyā viśvajyotiścatasra ṛtavyā daśa prāṇabhṛtaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:1056: atha caturthī aṣṭādaśa prathamā atha dvādaśātha saptadaśa tāḥ
GV03sb_10_u:1059: atha pañcamī pañcāsapatnāścatvāriṃśadvirāja ekayā na triṃśatstomabhāgāḥ pañca
GV03sb_10_u:1060: nākasadaḥ pañca pañcacūḍā ekatriṃśaccandasyā aṣṭau gārhapatyo citiraṣṭau
GV03sb_10_u:1061: punaścitirṛtavye viśvajyotirvikarṇī ca svayamātṛṇā cāśmā pṛśniryaścite'gnirnidhīyate
GV03sb_10_u:1064: tāḥ sarvāḥ pañcabhirna catvāri śatāni tayo yāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatānyaharlokāstā
GV03sb_10_u:1065: ahnāmeva sāptiḥ kriyate'hnām pratimā tāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca
GV03sb_10_u:1066: ha vai trīṇi ca śatāni saṃvatsarasyāhānyatha yāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśatpurīṣaṃ tāsāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśī
GV03sb_10_u:1068: pratimātha yā dvādaśa māsalokāstā māsānāmeva sāptiḥ kriyate māsānām pratimā tā u
GV03sb_10_u:1072: atha yā lokampṛṇāḥ muhurtalokāstā muhūrtānāmeva sāptiḥ kriyate muhūrtānām
GV03sb_10_u:1073: pratimā tā daśa ca sahasrāṇyaṣṭau ca śatāni bhavantyetāvanto hi saṃvatsarasya
GV03sb_10_u:1075: dhiṣṇyeṣvāhavanīya itarā etāvanti vai saṃvatsarasya rūpāṇi tānyasyātrāptānyupahitāni
GV03sb_10_u:1078: taddhaike āhavanīya evaitāṃ sampadamāpipayiṣantyanye vā ete'gnayaścitāḥ
GV03sb_10_u:1079: kimanyatropahitā iha sampaśyemeti na tathā kuryāddaśa vā etānagnīṃścinute'ṣṭau
GV03sb_10_u:1080: dhiṣṇyānāhavanīyaṃ ca gārhapatyaṃ ca tasmādāhurvirāḍagniriti daśākṣarā hi virāṭ
GV03sb_10_u:1081: tānnu sarvānekamivaivācakṣate'gnirityetasya hyevaitāni sarvāṇi rūpāṇi yathā
GV03sb_10_u:1082: saṃvatsarasyāhorātrāṇyardhamāsā māsā ṛtava evamasyaitāni sarvāṇi rūpāṇi 10.4.3.[22]
GV03sb_10_u:1084: te ye ha tathā kurvanti etāni hāsya te rūpāṇi bahirdhā kurvantyatho pāpavasyasaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1085: kurvanti kṣatrāya viśam pratipratinīm pratyudyāminīmāgnīdhrīye vā aśmānam
GV03sb_10_u:1086: pṛśnimupadadhātyatha taṃ sampaśyati kimu taṃ sampaśyannitarā na
GV03sb_10_u:1089: tadāhuḥ kathamu tā atra na sampaśyatīti na hyenā abhijuhotyāhutyā vā iṣṭakā sarvā
GV03sb_10_u:1092: tadāhuḥ kathamasyaitā anatiriktā upahitā bhavantīti vīryaṃ vā asyaitā anatiriktaṃ vai
GV03sb_10_u:1093: puruṣaṃ vīryaṃ sa ha vā etaṃ sarvaṃ kṛtsnam prajāpatiṃ saṃskaroti ya evaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1096: prajāpatiṃ vai prajāḥ sṛjamānam pāpmā mṛtyurabhiparijaghāna sa tapo'tapyata
GV03sb_10_u:1099: tasya tapastepānasya ebhyo lomagartebhya ūrdhvāni jyotīṃṣyāyaṃstadyāni tāni
GV03sb_10_u:1100: jyotīṃṣyetāni tāni nakṣatrāṇi yāvantyetāni nakṣatrāṇi tāvanto lomagartā yāvanto
GV03sb_10_u:1103: sa sahasratame saṃvatsare sarvo'tyapavata sa yaḥ so'tyapavatāyameva sa vāyuryo'yam
GV03sb_10_u:1104: pavate'tha yaṃ tam pāpmānamatyapavatedaṃ tacarīraṃ ka u tasmai manuṣyo yaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:1107: sarvā evaitā iṣṭakāḥ sāhasrīrupāsīta rātrisahasreṇa rātrisahasreṇaikaikām pariśritaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1112: saṃvatsaraṃ te ya etamevamagniṃ saṃvatsareṇa sampannaṃ viduḥ sahasratamīṃ hāsya
GV03sb_10_u:1113: te kalāṃ viduratha ya enamevaṃ na vidurna hāsya te sahasratamīṃ cana kalāṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1114: viduratha ya evaivaṃ veda yo vaitatkarma kurute sa haivaitaṃ sarvaṃ kṛtsnam
GV03sb_10_u:1115: prājāpatyamagnimāpnoti yam prajāpatirāpnottasmādevaṃvittapa eva tapyeta yadu ha
GV03sb_10_u:1116: vā evaṃvittapa tapyata ā maithunātsarvaṃ hāsya tatsvargaṃ lokamabhisambhavati 10.4.4.[5]
GV03sb_10_u:1118: tadetadṛcābhyuktam na mṛṣā śrāntaṃ yadavanti devā iti na haivaivaṃ viduṣaḥ kiṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1119: cana mṛṣā śrāntam bhavati tatho hāsyaitatsarvaṃ devā avanti 10.4.5.[1]
GV03sb_10_u:1121: athādeśā upaniṣadām vāyuragniriti ha śākāyanina upāsata ādityo'gnirityu haika
GV03sb_10_u:1122: āhuratha ha smāha śraumatyo vā hāliṅgavo vā
GV03sb_10_u:1125: śāṭyāyaniru ha smāha saṃvatsara evāgnistasya vasantaḥ śiro grīṣmo dakṣiṇaḥ pakṣo
GV03sb_10_u:1126: varṣā uttaraḥ śaradṛturmadhyamātmā hemantaśiśirāvṛtū pucam pratiṣṭhā vāgagniḥ
GV03sb_10_u:1127: prāṇo vāyuścakṣurādityo manaścandramāḥ śrotraṃ diśa āpo mithunaṃ tapaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:1128: pratiṣṭhā māsāḥ parvāṇyardhamāsā nāḍyo'horātrāṇi rajatasuvarṇāni patrāṇi sa evaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1129: devānapyetīti saṃvatsaro'gnirityu haiva vidyādetanmayo bhavatīti tveva vidyāt 10.4.5.[3]
GV03sb_10_u:1131: celaka u ha smāha śāṇḍilyāyanaḥ ima eva lokāstisraḥ svayamātṛṇavatyaścitayo
GV03sb_10_u:1132: yajamānaścaturthī sarve kāmāḥ pañcamīmāṃśca lokāntsaṃskurva ātmānaṃ ca
GV03sb_10_u:1135: tasya vā etasyāgneḥ vāgevopaniṣadvācā hi cīyata ṛcā yajuṣā sāmneti nu daivyātha
GV03sb_10_u:1136: yanmānuṣyā vācāhetīdaṃ kurutetīdaṃ kuruteti tadu ha tayā cīyate 10.5.1.[2]
GV03sb_10_u:1138: sā vā eṣā vāktredhāvihitā ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni tenāgnistredhāvihita etena hi trayeṇa
GV03sb_10_u:1139: cīyate'pyahaivaṃ tredhāvihita itthaṃ ha tvevāpi tredhāvihito yadasmiṃstredhāvihitā
GV03sb_10_u:1143: so'yamātmā tredhāvihita eva so'nena tredhāvihitenātmanaitaṃ tredhāvihitaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1144: daivamamṛtamāpnoti tā u sarvā iṣṭakā ityevācakṣate neṣṭaka iti neṣṭakamiti vāco
GV03sb_10_u:1145: rūpeṇa vāgghyevaitatsarvaṃ yatstrī punānnapuṃsakaṃ vācā hyevaitatsarvamāptaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1146: tasmādenā aṅgirasvaddhruvā sīdetyeva sarvāḥ sādayati nāṅgirasvaddhruvaḥ sīdeti
GV03sb_10_u:1149: sā yā sā vāgasau sa ādityaḥ sa eṣa mṛtyustadyakiṃ cārvācīnamādityātsarvaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1150: tanmṛtyunāptaṃ sa yo hainamato'rvācīnaṃ cinute mṛtyunā hainaṃ sa āptaṃ cinute
GV03sb_10_u:1151: mṛtyave ha sa ātmānamapidadhātyatha ya enamata ūrdhvaṃ cinute sa
GV03sb_10_u:1152: punarmṛtyumapajayati vidyayā ha vā asyaiṣo'ta ūrdhvaṃ cito bhavati 10.5.1.[5]
GV03sb_10_u:1154: sā vā eṣā vāktredhāvihitā ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni maṇḍalamevarco'rciḥ sāmāni puruṣo
GV03sb_10_u:1161: yadetadarcirdīpyate tanmahāvrataṃ tāni sāmāni sa sāmnāṃ loko'tha ya eṣa
GV03sb_10_u:1162: etasminmaṇḍale puruṣaḥ so'gnistāni yajūṃṣi sa yajuṣāṃ lokaḥ 10.5.2.[7]
GV03sb_10_u:1164: saiṣā trayyeva vidyā tapati taddhaitadapyavidvāṃsa āhustrayī vā eṣā vidyā tapatīti
GV03sb_10_u:1167: sa eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣo'thaitadamṛtaṃ yadetadarcirdīpyate tasmānmṛtyurna
GV03sb_10_u:1170: tadeṣa śloko bhavati antaram mṛtyoramṛtamityavaraṃ hyetanmṛtyoramṛtam
GV03sb_10_u:1172: mṛtyurvivasvantaṃ vasta ityasau vā ādityo vivasvāneṣa hyahorātre vivaste tameṣa
GV03sb_10_u:1173: vaste sarvato hyenena parivṛto mṛtyorātmā vivasvatītyetasminhi maṇḍala etasya
GV03sb_10_u:1176: tayorvā etayoḥ ubhayoretasya cārciṣa etasya ca puruṣasyaitanmaṇḍalam pratiṣṭhā
GV03sb_10_u:1177: tasmānmahaduktham parasmai na śaṃsennedetām pratiṣṭhāṃ cinadā ityetāṃ ha sa
GV03sb_10_u:1178: pratiṣṭhāṃ cintte yo mahaduktham parasmai śaṃsati tasmādukthaśasam bhūyiṣṭham
GV03sb_10_u:1181: athādhiyajñam yade tanmaṇḍalaṃ tapatyayaṃ sa rukmo'tha yadetadarcirdīpyata idaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1182: tatpuṣkaraparṇamāpo hyetā āpaḥ puṣkaraparṇamatha ya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale
GV03sb_10_u:1185: eṣa tapati tasmādagniṃ nādriyeta parihantumamutra hyeṣa tadā bhavatītyu
GV03sb_10_u:1188: athādhyātmam yadetanmaṇḍalaṃ tapati yaścaiṣa rukma idaṃ tacuklamakṣannatha
GV03sb_10_u:1190: etasminmaṇḍale puruṣo yaścaiṣa hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣo'yameva sa yo'yaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1193: sa eṣa eva lokampṛṇā tāmeṣa sarvo'gnirabhisampadyate tasyaitanmithunaṃ yo'yaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1194: savye'kṣanpuruṣo'rdhamu haitadātmano yanmithunaṃ yadā vai saha mithunenātha
GV03sb_10_u:1195: sarvo'tha kṛtsnaḥ kṛtsnatāyai tadyatte dve bhavato dvandvaṃ hi mithunam
GV03sb_10_u:1196: prajananaṃ tasmāddve-dve lokampṛṇe upadhīyete tasmādu dvābhyāṃ citim
GV03sb_10_u:1199: sa eṣa evendraḥ yo'yaṃ dakṣiṇe'kṣanpuruṣo'theyamindrāṇī tābhyāṃ devā etāṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1201: vīryavantamu ha sā janayati yasyā ante nāśnāti 10.5.2.[15]
GV03sb_10_u:1203: tadetaddevavrataṃ rājanyabandhavo manuṣyāṇāmanutamāṃ gopāyanti tasmādu teṣu
GV03sb_10_u:1206: tau hṛdayasyākāśam pratyavetya mithunībhavatastau yadā mithunasyāntaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1207: gacato'tha haitatpuruṣaḥ svapiti tadyathā haivedam mānuṣasya mithunasyāntaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1208: gatvāsaṃvida iva bhavatyevaṃ haivaitadasaṃvida-iva bhavati daivaṃ hyetanmithunam
GV03sb_10_u:1211: tasmādevaṃvitsvapyāt lokyaṃ haite eva taddevate mithunena priyeṇa dhāmnā
GV03sb_10_u:1212: samardhayati tasmādu ha svapantaṃ dhureva na bodhayennedete devate
GV03sb_10_u:1213: mithunobhavantyau hinasānīti tasmādu haitatsuṣupuṣaḥ śleṣmaṇamiva mukham
GV03sb_10_u:1214: bhavatyete eva taddevate retaḥ siñcatastasmādretasa idaṃ sarvaṃ sambhavati yadidaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1217: sa eṣa eva mṛtyuḥ ya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣo yaścāyaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1218: dakṣiṇe'kṣanpuruṣastasya haitasya hṛdaye pādāvatihatau tau haitadācidyotkrāmati
GV03sb_10_u:1219: sa yadotkrāmatyatha haitatpuruṣo mriyate tasmādu haitatpretamāhurācedyasyeti 10.5.2.[19]
GV03sb_10_u:1221: eṣa u eva prāṇaḥ eṣa hīmāḥ sarvāḥ prajā praṇayati tasyaite prāṇāḥ svāḥ sa yadā
GV03sb_10_u:1222: svapityathainamete prāṇāḥ svā apiyanti tasmātsvāpyayaḥ svāpyayo ha vai taṃ svapna
GV03sb_10_u:1225: sa etaiḥ suptaḥ na kasya cana veda na manasā saṃkalpayati na vācānnasya rasaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1226: vijānāti na prāṇena gandhaṃ vijānāti na cakṣuṣā paśyati na śrotreṇa śṛṇotyetaṃ hyete
GV03sb_10_u:1227: tadāpītā bhavanti sa eṣa ekaḥ sanprajāsu bahudhā vyāviṣṭastasmādekā satī
GV03sb_10_u:1230: tadāhuḥ eko mṛtyurbahavā3 ityekaśca bahavaśceti ha brūyādyadahāsāvamutra
GV03sb_10_u:1231: tenaiko'tha yadiha prajāsu bahudhā vyāviṣṭasteno bahavaḥ 10.5.2.[22]
GV03sb_10_u:1233: tadāhuḥ antike mṛtyurdūrā ityantike ca dūre ceti ha brūyādyadahāyamihādhyātmaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1236: tadeṣa śloko bhavati anne bhātyapaśrito rasānāṃ saṃkṣare'mṛta iti
GV03sb_10_u:1237: yadetanmaṇḍalaṃ tapati tadannamatha ya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣaḥ so'ttā sa
GV03sb_10_u:1240: athādhyātmam idameva śarīramannamatha yo'yaṃ dakṣiṇe'kṣanpuruṣaḥ so'ttā sa
GV03sb_10_u:1243: tametamagnirityadhvaryava upāsate yajurityeṣa hīdaṃ sarvaṃ yunakti sāmeti
GV03sb_10_u:1244: candogā etasminhīdaṃ sarvaṃ samānamukthamiti bahvṛcā eṣa hīdaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1245: sarvamutthāpayati yāturiti yātuvida etena hīdaṃ sarvaṃ yataṃ viṣamiti sarpāḥ sarpa
GV03sb_10_u:1246: iti sarpavida ūrgiti devā rayiriti manuṣyā māyetyasurāḥ svadheti pitaro devajana iti
GV03sb_10_u:1247: devajanavido rūpamiti gandharvā gandha ityapsarasastaṃ yathā-yathopāsate tadeva
GV03sb_10_u:1251: sa eṣa trīṣṭako'gniḥ ṛgekā yajurekā sāmaikā tadyāṃ kāṃ cātrarcopadadhāti rukma
GV03sb_10_u:1252: eva tasyā āyatanamatha yāṃ yajuṣā puruṣa eva tasyā āyatanamatha yāṃ sāmnā
GV03sb_10_u:1255: te vā ete ubhe eṣa ca rukma etacca puṣkaraparṇametam puruṣamapīta ubhe
GV03sb_10_u:1258: sa eṣa eva mṛtyuḥ ya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣo yaścāyaṃ dakṣiṇe'kṣanpuruṣaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:1259: sa eṣa evaṃvida ātmā bhavati sa
GV03sb_10_u:1263: neva vā idamagre'sadāsīnneva sadāsīt āsīdiva vā idamagre nevāsīttaddha tanmana
GV03sb_10_u:1266: tasmādetadṛṣiṇābhyanūktam nāsadāsīnno sadāsīttadānīmiti neva hi sanmano nevāsat 10.5.3.[3]
GV03sb_10_u:1271: manasācīyanta manasaiṣu grahā agṛhyanta manasāstuvata manasāśaṃsanyatkiṃ ca
GV03sb_10_u:1272: yajñe karma kriyate yatkiṃ ca yajñiyaṃ karma manasaiva teṣu tanmanomayeṣu
GV03sb_10_u:1273: manaścitsu manomayamakriyata tadyatkiṃ cemāni bhūtāni manasā saṃkalpayanti
GV03sb_10_u:1274: teṣāmeva sā kṛtistānevādadhati tāṃścinvanti teṣu grahāngṛhṇanti teṣu stuvate teṣu
GV03sb_10_u:1281: grahā agṛhyanta vācāstuvata vācāśaṃsanyatkiṃ ca yajñe karma kriyate yatkiṃ ca
GV03sb_10_u:1282: yajñiyaṃ karma vācaiva teṣu tadvāṅmayeṣu vākcitsu vāṅmayamakriyata tadyatkiṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1283: cemāni bhūtāni vācā vadanti teṣāmeva sā kṛtistānevādadhati tāṃścinvanti teṣu
GV03sb_10_u:1284: grahāngṛhṇanti teṣu stuvate teṣu śaṃsantyetāvatī vai vāco vibhūtiretāvatī
GV03sb_10_u:1288: sā vākprāṇamasṛjata so'yam prāṇaḥ sṛṣṭa āvirabubhūṣanniruktataro mūrtataraḥ sa
GV03sb_10_u:1291: prāṇenācīyanta prāṇenaiṣu grahā agṛhyanta prāṇenāstuvata prāṇenāśaṃsanyatkiṃ ca
GV03sb_10_u:1292: yajñe karma kriyate yatkiṃ ca yajñiyaṃ karma prāṇenaiva teṣu tatprāṇamayeṣu
GV03sb_10_u:1293: prāṇacitsu prāṇamayamakriyata tadyatkiṃ cemāni bhūtāni prāṇena prāṇanti teṣāmeva
GV03sb_10_u:1294: sā kṛtistānevādadhati tāṃṣcinvanti teṣu grahāngṛhṇanti teṣu stuvate teṣu
GV03sb_10_u:1295: śaṃsantyetāvatī vai prāṇasya vibhūtiretāvatī visṛṣṭiretāvānprāṇaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśa 10.5.3.[6]
GV03sb_10_u:1301: cakṣuṣāśaṃsanyatkiṃ ca yajñe karma kriyate yatkiṃ ca yajñiyaṃ karma cakṣuṣaiva
GV03sb_10_u:1302: teṣu taccakṣurmayeṣu cakṣuścitsu cakṣurmayamakriyata tadyatkiṃ cemāni bhūtāni
GV03sb_10_u:1303: cakṣuṣā paśyanti teṣāmeva sā kṛtistānevādadhati tāṃścinvanti teṣu grahāngṛhṇanti
GV03sb_10_u:1304: teṣu stuvate teṣu śaṃsantyetāvatī vai cakṣuṣo vibhūtiretāvatī visṛṣṭiretāvaccakṣuḥ
GV03sb_10_u:1310: śrotreṇācīyanta śrotreṇaiṣu grahā agṛhyanta śrotreṇāstuvata śrotreṇāśaṃsanyatkiṃ ca
GV03sb_10_u:1311: yajñe karma kriyate yatkiṃ ca yajñiyaṃ karma śrotreṇaiva teṣu tacrotramayeṣu
GV03sb_10_u:1312: śrotracitsu śrotramayamakriyata tadyatkiṃ cemāni bhūtāni śrotreṇa śṛṇvanti
GV03sb_10_u:1313: teṣāmeva sā kṛtistānevādadhati tāṃścinvanti teṣu grahāngṛhṇanti teṣu stuvate teṣu
GV03sb_10_u:1314: śaṃsantyetāvatī vai śrotrasya vibhūtiretāvatī visṛṣṭiretāvacrotraṃ ṣaṭtriṃśa 10.5.3.[8]
GV03sb_10_u:1317: saṃdeghamannasaṃdehamakṛtsnaṃ vai karmarte prāṇebhyo'kṛtsnā uvai prāṇā ṛte
GV03sb_10_u:1323: karmaṇācīyanta karmaṇaiṣu grahā agṛhyanta karmaṇāstuvata karmaṇāśaṃsanyatkiṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1324: ca yajñe karma kriyate yatkiṃ ca yajñiyaṃ karma karmaṇaiva teṣu tatkarmamayeṣu
GV03sb_10_u:1325: karmacitsu karmamayamakriyata tadyatkiṃ cemāni bhūtāni karma kurvate teṣāmeva
GV03sb_10_u:1326: sā kṛtistānevādadhati tāṃścinvanti teṣu grahāngṛhṇanti teṣu stuvate teṣu
GV03sb_10_u:1327: śaṃsantyetāvatī vai karmaṇo vibhūtiretāvatī visṛṣṭiretāvatkarma ṣaṭtriṃśa 10.5.3.[10]
GV03sb_10_u:1329: tatkarmāgnimasṛjata āvistarāṃ vā agniḥ karmaṇaḥ karmaṇā hyenaṃ janayanti
GV03sb_10_u:1332: so'yamagniḥ sṛṣṭa āvirabubhūṣat niruktataro mūrtataraḥ sa ātmānamanvaicatsa
GV03sb_10_u:1335: tāgninaiṣu grahā agṛhyantāgnināstuvatāgnināśaṃsanyatkiṃ ca yajñe karma kriyate
GV03sb_10_u:1336: yatkiṃ ca yajñiyaṃ karmāgninaiva teṣu tadagnimayeṣvagnicitsvagnimayamakriyata
GV03sb_10_u:1337: tadyatkiṃ cemāni bhūtānyagnimindhate teṣāmeva sā kṛtistānevādadhati tāṃścinvanti
GV03sb_10_u:1338: teṣu grahāngṛhṇanti teṣu stuvate teṣu śaṃsantyetāvatī vā agnervibhūtiretāvatī
GV03sb_10_u:1342: te haite vidyācita eva tānhaitānevaṃvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni cinvantyapi svapate
GV03sb_10_u:1345: ayaṃ vāva loka eṣo'gniścitaḥ tasyāpa eva pariśrito manuṣyā yajuṣmatya iṣṭakāḥ
GV03sb_10_u:1350: antarikṣaṃ ha tvevaiṣo'gniścitaḥ tasya dyāvāpṛthivyoreva saṃdhiḥ pariśritaḥ pareṇa
GV03sb_10_u:1351: hāntarikṣaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī saṃdhattastāḥ pariśrito vayāṃsi yajuṣmatya iṣṭakā varṣaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1352: sūdadohā marīcayaḥ purīṣamāhutayaḥ samidho vāyurlokampṛṇā tadvā etatsarvaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1355: dyaurha tvevaiṣo'gniścitaḥ tasyāpa eva pariśrito yathā ha vā idaṃ kośaḥ samubjita
GV03sb_10_u:1356: evamime lokā apsvantastadyā imāṃlokānpareṇāpastāḥ pariśrito devā yajuṣmatya
GV03sb_10_u:1357: iṣṭakā yadevaitasmiṃloke'nnaṃ tatsūdadohā nakṣatrāṇi purīṣamāhutayaḥ samidha
GV03sb_10_u:1360: ādityo ha tvevaiṣo'gniścitaḥ tasya diśa eva pariśritastāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatāni
GV03sb_10_u:1361: bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca ha vai trīṇi ca śatānyādityaṃ diśaḥ samantam pariyanti raśmayo
GV03sb_10_u:1362: yajuṣmatya iṣṭakāstāḥ ṣaṣṭiścaiva trīṇi ca śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca ha vai trīṇi ca
GV03sb_10_u:1364: pratyarpayatyatha yadantarā diśaśca raśmīṃśca tatsūdadohā atha yaddikṣu ca
GV03sb_10_u:1365: raśmiṣu cānnaṃ tatpurīṣaṃ tā āhutayastāḥ samidho'tha yaddiśa iti ca raśmaya iti
GV03sb_10_u:1366: cākhyāyate tallokampṛṇā tadvā etatsarvaṃ diśa iti caiva raśmaya iti cākhyāyate
GV03sb_10_u:1369: nakṣatrāṇi ha tvevaiṣo'gniścitaḥ tāni vā etāni saptaviṃśatirnakṣatrāṇi saptaviṃśatiḥ
GV03sb_10_u:1370: saptaviṃśatirhopanakṣatrāṇyekaikaṃ nakṣatramanūpatiṣṭhante tāni sapta ca śatāni
GV03sb_10_u:1371: viṃśatiścādhi ṣaṭtriṃśattato yāni sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiśceṣṭakā eva tāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca
GV03sb_10_u:1372: trīṇi ca śatāni pariśritaḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatāni yajuṣmatyo'tha yānyadhi
GV03sb_10_u:1373: ṣaṭtriṃśatsa trayodaśo māsaḥ sa ātmā triṃśadātmā pratiṣṭhā dve śira eva ṣaṭtriṃśyau
GV03sb_10_u:1374: tadyatte dve bhavato dvyakṣaraṃ hi śiro'tha yadantarā nakṣatre tatsūdadohā atha
GV03sb_10_u:1379: tā vā etāḥ ekaviṃśatirbṛhatya ekaviṃśo vai svargo loko bṛhatī svargo lokastadeṣa
GV03sb_10_u:1380: svargaṃ lokamabhisampadyata ekaviṃśaṃ ca stomam bṛhatīṃ ca candaḥ 10.5.4.[7]
GV03sb_10_u:1382: candāṃsi ha tvevaiṣo'gniścitaḥ tāni vā etāni sapta candāṃsi caturuttarāṇi tricāni teṣāṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1383: sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiścākṣarāṇyadhi ṣaṭtriṃśattato yāni sapta ca śatāni
GV03sb_10_u:1384: viṃśatiśceṣṭakā eva tāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatāni pariśritaḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatāni
GV03sb_10_u:1385: yajuṣmatyo'tha yānyadhi ṣaṭtriṃśatsa trayodaśo māsaḥ sa ātmā triṃśadātmā
GV03sb_10_u:1386: pratiṣṭhā dve prāṇā dve śira eva ṣaṭtriṃśyau tadyatte dve bhavato dvyakṣaraṃ hi
GV03sb_10_u:1389: tasyai vā etasyai ṣaṭtriṃśadakṣarāyai bṛhatyai yāni daśa prathamānyakṣarāṇi sā
GV03sb_10_u:1390: daśākṣaraikapadātha yāni viṃśatiḥ sā viṃśatyakṣarā dvipadātha yāni triṃśatsā
GV03sb_10_u:1391: triṃśadakṣarā virāḍatha yāni trayastriṃśatsā trayastriṃśadakṣarātha yāni
GV03sb_10_u:1394: trīṇyakṣarāṇi tripadā gāyatrī tenaiṣa gāyatro'gnirmṛdāpa iti trīṇyakṣarāṇi tripadā
GV03sb_10_u:1395: gāyatrī teno evaiṣa gāyatro'tha yadantarā candasī tatsūdadohā atha
GV03sb_10_u:1396: yaccandaḥsvannaṃ tatpurīṣaṃ tā āhutayastāḥ samidho'tha yaccandāṃsītyākhyāyate
GV03sb_10_u:1399: tā vā etāḥ ekaviṃśatirbṛhatya ekaviṃśo vai svargo loko bṛhatī svargo lokastadeṣa
GV03sb_10_u:1400: svargaṃ lokamabhisampadyata ekaviṃśaṃ ca stomam bṛhatīṃ ca candaḥ 10.5.4.[10]
GV03sb_10_u:1402: saṃvatsaro ha tvevaiṣo'gniścitaḥ tasya rātraya eva pariśritastāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca
GV03sb_10_u:1403: śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca ha vai trīṇi ca śatāni saṃvatsarasya rātrayo'hāni yajuṣmatya
GV03sb_10_u:1404: iṣṭakāstāḥ ṣaṣṭiścaiva trīṇi ca śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca ha vai trīṇi ca śatāni
GV03sb_10_u:1405: saṃvatsarasyāhānyatha yā amūḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadiṣṭakā atiyanti yaḥ sa trayodaśo māsa
GV03sb_10_u:1406: ātmārdhamāsāśca te māsāśca caturviṃśatirardhamāsā dvādaśa māsā atha
GV03sb_10_u:1407: yadantarāhorātre tatsūdadohā atha yadahorātreṣvannaṃ tatpurīṣaṃ tā āhutayastāḥ
GV03sb_10_u:1411: tā vā etāḥ ekaviṃśatirbṛhatya ekaviṃśo vai svargo loko bṛhatī svargo lokastadeṣa
GV03sb_10_u:1412: svargaṃ lokamabhisampadyate ekaviṃśaṃ ca stomam bṛhatīṃ ca candaḥ 10.5.4.[12]
GV03sb_10_u:1414: ātmā ha tvevaiṣo'gniścitaḥ tasyāsthīnyeva pariśritastāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatāni
GV03sb_10_u:1415: bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca ha vai trīṇi ca śatāni puruṣasyāsthīni majjāno yajuṣmatya
GV03sb_10_u:1416: iṣṭakāstāḥ ṣaṣṭiścaiva trīṇi ca śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca ha vai trīṇi ca śatāni
GV03sb_10_u:1417: puruṣasya majjāno'tha yā amūḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadiṣṭakā atiyanti yaḥ sa trayodaśo māsa
GV03sb_10_u:1418: ātmā prāṇaḥ sa tasya triṃśadātmanvidhāḥ pratiṣṭhāyāṃ dve śīrṣandve tadyatte dve
GV03sb_10_u:1419: bhavato dvikapālaṃ hi śiro'tha yenemāni parvāṇi saṃtatāni tatsūdadohā athaitattrayaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1420: yenāyamātmā pracanno loma tvaṅmāṃsamiti tatpurīṣaṃ yatpibati tā āhutayo
GV03sb_10_u:1421: yadaśnāti tāḥ samidho'tha yadātmetyākhyāyate tallokampṛṇā tadvā
GV03sb_10_u:1426: sarvāṇi ha tveva bhūtāni sarve devā eṣo'gniścita āpo vai sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni
GV03sb_10_u:1427: tā haitā āpa evaiṣo'gniścitastasya nāvyā eva pariśritastāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatāni
GV03sb_10_u:1428: bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca ha vai trīṇi ca śatānyādityaṃ nāvyāḥ samantam pariyanti nāvyā u
GV03sb_10_u:1429: eva yajuṣmatya iṣṭakāstāḥ ṣaṣṭiścaiva trīṇi ca śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca ha vai trīṇi
GV03sb_10_u:1430: ca śatānyādityaṃ nāvyā abhikṣarantyatha yadantarā nāvye tatsūdadohā atha yā amūḥ
GV03sb_10_u:1431: ṣaṭtriṃśadiṣṭakā atiyanti yaḥ sa trayodaśo māsa ātmāyameva sa yo'yaṃ hiraṇmayaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:1434: tasyaite pratiṣṭhe rukmaśca puṣkaraparṇaṃ cāpaścādityamaṇḍalaṃ ca srucau bāhū
GV03sb_10_u:1435: tāvindrāgnī dve svayamātṛṇe iyaṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca tisro viśvajyotiṣa etā devatā
GV03sb_10_u:1436: agnirvāyurāditya etā hyeva devatā viśvaṃ jyotirdvādaśartavyāḥ sa saṃvatsaraḥ sa ātmā
GV03sb_10_u:1437: pañca pañcacūḍāḥ sa yajñaste devā atha yadvikarṇī ca svayamātṛṇā cāśmā
GV03sb_10_u:1438: pṛśniryaścite'gnirnidhīyate sā pañcatrīṃśī lokampṛṇāyai yajuḥ ṣaṭtriṃśī so'syaiṣa
GV03sb_10_u:1439: sarvasyāntamevātmā sa eṣa sarvāsāmapām madhye sa eṣa sarvaiḥ kāmaiḥ sampanna
GV03sb_10_u:1440: āpo vai sarve kāmāḥ sa eṣo'kāmaḥ sarvakāmo na hyetaṃ kasya cana kāmaḥ 10.5.4.[16]
GV03sb_10_u:1442: tadeṣa śloko bhavati vidyayā tadārohanti yatra kāmāḥ parāgatāḥ na tatra dakṣiṇā
GV03sb_10_u:1443: yanti nāvidvāṃsastapasvina iti na haiva taṃ lokaṃ dakṣiṇābhirna
GV03sb_10_u:1446: abhram purīṣam candramā āhutayo nakṣatrāṇi samidho yaccandramā nakṣatre
GV03sb_10_u:1447: vasatyāhutistatsamidhi vasatyetadu vā āhuterannameṣā pratiṣṭhā tasmādāhutirna
GV03sb_10_u:1448: kṣīyata etaddhyasyā annameṣā pratiṣṭhātha yaddevā ityākhyāyate tallokampṛṇā
GV03sb_10_u:1451: tadetadṛcābhyuktam viśve devā anu tatte yajurguriti sarvāṇi hyatra bhūtāni sarve
GV03sb_10_u:1452: devā yajureva bhavanti tatsarvo'gnirlokampṛṇāmabhisampadyate sa yo haitadevaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1455: tā vā etāḥ ekaviṃśatirbṛhatya ekaviṃśo vai svargo loko bṛhatī svargo lokastadeṣa
GV03sb_10_u:1456: svargaṃ lokamabhisampadyata ekaviṃśaṃ ca stomam bṛhatīṃ ca candaḥ 10.5.5.[1]
GV03sb_10_u:1458: kuśrirha vājaśravaso'gniṃ cikye taṃ hovāca suśruvāḥ kauṣyo gautama
GV03sb_10_u:1465: yadyu vā enam pratyañcamacaiṣīḥ kasmādasya tarhi paścātpucamakārṣīḥ 10.5.5.[4]
GV03sb_10_u:1467: yadyu vā enaṃ nyañcamacaiṣīḥ yathā nīcaḥ śayānasya pṛṣṭhe'nnādyam
GV03sb_10_u:1470: yadyu vā enamuttānamacaiṣīḥ na vā uttānaṃ vayaḥ svargaṃ lokamabhivahati na tvā
GV03sb_10_u:1476: sa yatprāñcam puruṣamupadadhāti prācyau srucau tatprāṅ cīyate'tha yatpratyañcaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1477: kūrmamupadadhāti pratyañci paśuśīrṣāṇi tatpratyaṅ cīyate'tha yannyañcaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1478: kūrmamupadadhāti nyañci paśuśīrṣāṇi nīcīriṣṭakāstannyaṅ cīyate'tha yaduttānam
GV03sb_10_u:1480: taduttānaścīyate'tha yatsarvā anu diśaḥ parisarpamiṣṭakā upadadhāti
GV03sb_10_u:1483: atha ha koṣā dhāvayantaḥ nirūḍhaśirasamagnimupādhāvayāṃ cakrusteṣāṃ haika
GV03sb_10_u:1484: uvāca śrīrvai śiraḥ śriyamasya nirauhītsarvajyāniṃ jyāsyata iti sa ha tathaivāsa 10.5.5.[9]
GV03sb_10_u:1486: atha haika uvāca prāṇā vai śiraḥ prāṇānasya nirauhītkṣipre'muṃ lokameṣyatīti sa u
GV03sb_10_u:1489: ūrdhvo vā eṣa etaccīyate yaddarbhastambo logeṣṭakāḥ puṣkaraparṇaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1490: rukmapuruṣau srucau svayamātṛṇā dūrveṣṭakā dviyajū retaḥsicau viśvajyotirṛtavye
GV03sb_10_u:1491: aṣāḍhā kūrmo'tha hāsyaitadeva pratyakṣatamāṃ śiro yaścite'gnirnidhīyate tasmānna
GV03sb_10_u:1494: atha haite'ruṇe aupaveśau samājagmuḥ satyayajñaḥ pauluṣirmahāśālo jābālo buḍila
GV03sb_10_u:1495: āśvatarāśvirindradyumno bhāllaveyo janaḥ śārkarākṣyaste ha vaiśvānare samāsata
GV03sb_10_u:1498: te hocuḥ aśvapatirvā ayaṃ kaikeyaḥ samprati vaiśvānaraṃ veda taṃ gacāmeti te
GV03sb_10_u:1500: pṛthakṣāhasrāntsomānprovāca te ha prātarasaṃvidānā eva samitprāṇayaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:1503: sa hovāca yannu bhagavanto'nūcānā anūcānaputrāḥ kimidamiti te hocurvaiśvānaraṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1504: ha bhagavāntsamprati veda taṃ no brūhīti sa hovāca samprati khalu nvā ahaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1507: sa hovācāruṇamaupaveśiṃ gautama kaṃ tvaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vettheti pṛthivīmeva
GV03sb_10_u:1508: rājanniti hovācomiti hovācaiṣa vai vaiśvānara etaṃ hi vai tvam pratiṣṭhāṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1509: vaiśvānaraṃ vettha tasmāttvam pratiṣṭhitaḥ prajayā paśubhirasi yo vā etam
GV03sb_10_u:1510: pratiṣṭhāṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vedāpa punarmṛtyuh+ jayati sarvamāyureti pādau tvā etau
GV03sb_10_u:1511: vaiśvānarasya pādau te'mlāsyatāṃ yadi ha nāgamiṣya iti pādau te'viditāvabhaviṣyatāṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1514: atha hovāca satyayajñam pauluṣim prācīnayogya kaṃ tvaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vetthetyapa
GV03sb_10_u:1515: eva rājanniti hovācomiti hovācaiṣa vai rayirvaiśvānara etaṃ hi vai tvaṃ rayiṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1516: vaiśvānaraṃ vettha tasmāttvaṃ rayimānpuṣṭimānasi yo vā etaṃ rayiṃ vaiśvānaraṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1517: vedāpa punarmṛtyuṃ jayati sarvamāyureti vastistvā eṣa vaiśvānarasya
GV03sb_10_u:1518: vastistvāhāsyadyadi ha nāgamiṣya iti vastiste'vidito'bhaviṣyadyadi ha nāgamiṣya iti
GV03sb_10_u:1521: atha hovāca mahāśālaṃ jābālam aupamanyava kaṃ tvaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1522: vetthetyākāśameva rājanniti hovācomiti hovācaiṣa vai bahulo vaiśvānara etaṃ hi vai
GV03sb_10_u:1523: tvam bahulaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vettha tasmāttvam bahuḥ prajayā paśubhirasi yo vā etam
GV03sb_10_u:1524: bahulaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vedāpa punarmṛtyuṃ jayati sarvamāyuretyātmā tvā eṣa
GV03sb_10_u:1525: vaiśvānarasyātmā tvāhāsyadyadi ha nāgamiṣya ityātmā te'vidito'bhaviṣyadyadi ha
GV03sb_10_u:1528: atha hovāca buḍilamāśvatarāśvim vaiyāghrapadya kaṃ tvaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vettheti
GV03sb_10_u:1529: vāyumeva rājanniti hovācomiti hovācaiṣa vai pṛthagvartmā vaiśvānara etaṃ hi vai
GV03sb_10_u:1530: tvam pṛthagvartmānaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vettha tasmāttvām pṛthagrathaśreṇayo'nuyānti yo
GV03sb_10_u:1531: vā etam pṛthagvartmānaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vedāpa punarmṛtyuṃ jayati sarvamāyureti
GV03sb_10_u:1532: prāṇastvā eṣa vaiśvānarasya prāṇastvāhāsyadyadi ha nāgamiṣya iti
GV03sb_10_u:1535: atha hovācendradyumnam bhāllaveyam vaiyāghrapadya kaṃ tvaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1536: vetthetyādityameva rājanniti hovācomiti hovācaiṣa vai sutatejā vaiśvānara etaṃ hi vai
GV03sb_10_u:1537: tvaṃ sutatejasaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vettha tasmāttavaiṣa suto'dyamānaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:1538: pacyamāno'kṣīyamāṇo gṛheṣu tiṣṭhati yo vā etaṃ sutatejasaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vedāpa
GV03sb_10_u:1539: punarmṛtyuṃ jayati sarvamāyureti cakṣustvā etadvaiśvānarasya cakṣustvāhāsyadyadi
GV03sb_10_u:1540: ha nāgamiṣya iti cakṣuste'viditamabhaviṣyadyadi ha nāgamiṣya iti vā 10.6.1.[9]
GV03sb_10_u:1542: atha hovāca janaṃ śārkarākṣyam sāyavasa kaṃ tvaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vettheti divameva
GV03sb_10_u:1543: rājanniti hovācomiti hovācaiṣa vā atiṣṭhā vaiśvānara etaṃ hi vai tvamatiṣṭhāṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1544: vaiśvānaraṃ vettha tasmāttvaṃ samānānatitiṣṭhasi yo vā etamatiṣṭhāṃ vaiśvānaraṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1545: vedāpa punarmṛtyuṃ jayati sarvamāyureti mūrdhā tvā eṣa vaiśvānarasya mūrdhā
GV03sb_10_u:1546: tvāhāsyadyadi ha nāgamiṣya iti mūrdhā te'vidito'bhaviṣyadyadi ha nāgamiṣya iti vā 10.6.1.[10]
GV03sb_10_u:1548: tānhovāca ete vai yūyam pṛthagvaiśvānarānvidvāṃsaḥ pṛthagannamaghasta
GV03sb_10_u:1549: prādeśamātramiva ha vai devāḥ suviditā abhisampannāstathā tu va enānvakṣyāmi
GV03sb_10_u:1552: sa hovāca mūrdhānamupadiśanneṣa vā atiṣṭhā vaiśvānara iti cakṣuṣī
GV03sb_10_u:1553: upadiśannuvācaiṣa vai sutatejā vaiśvānara iti nāsike upadiśannuvācaiṣa vai
GV03sb_10_u:1554: pṛthagvartmā vaiśvānara iti mukhyamākāśamupadiśannuvācaiṣa vai bahulo
GV03sb_10_u:1555: vaiśvānara iti mukhyā apa upadiśannuvācaiṣa vai rayirvaiśvānaro iti
GV03sb_10_u:1556: cubukamupadiśannuvācaiṣa vai pratiṣṭhā vaiśvānara iti sa eṣo'gnirvaiśvānaro
GV03sb_10_u:1557: yatpuruṣaḥ sa yo haitamevamagniṃ vaiśvānaram puruṣavidham puruṣe'ntaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:1558: pratiṣṭhitaṃ vedāpa punarmṛtyuṃ jayati sarvamāyureti na hāsya bruvāṇaṃ cana
GV03sb_10_u:1561: dvayaṃ vā idamattā caivādyaṃ ca tadyadobhayaṃ samāgacatyattaivākhyāyate nādyam 10.6.2.[2]
GV03sb_10_u:1563: sa vai yaḥ so'ttāgnireva saḥ tasminyatkiṃ cābhyādadhatyāhitaya evāsya tā āhitayo ha
GV03sb_10_u:1564: vai tā āhutaya ityācakṣate paro'kṣam paro'kṣakāmā hi devāḥ 10.6.2.[3]
GV03sb_10_u:1566: ādityo vā attā tasya candramā evāhitayaścandramasaṃ hyāditya
GV03sb_10_u:1569: athādhyātmam prāṇo vā attā tasyānnamevāhitayo'nnaṃ hi prāṇa ādadhatīti nvagneḥ 10.6.2.[5]
GV03sb_10_u:1571: athārkasya agnirvā arkastasyāhutaya eva kamāhutayo hyagnaye kam 10.6.2.[6]
GV03sb_10_u:1573: ādityo vā arkaḥ tasya candramā eva kaṃ candramā hyādityāya kamityadhidevatam 10.6.2.[7]
GV03sb_10_u:1575: athādhyātmam prāṇo vā arkastasyānnameva kamannaṃ hi prāṇāya kamiti
GV03sb_10_u:1580: ādityo vā uk tasya candramā eva thaṃ candramasā hyāditya uttiṣṭhatītyadhidevatam 10.6.2.[10]
GV03sb_10_u:1582: athādhyātmam prāṇo vā uktasyānnameva thamannena hi prāṇa uttiṣṭhatīti
GV03sb_10_u:1583: nvevokthasya sa eṣo'gnividho'rkavidha ukthavidho yatpuruṣaḥ sa yo
GV03sb_10_u:1587: prāṇena vā agnirdīpyate agninā vāyurvāyunāditya ādityena candramāścandramasā
GV03sb_10_u:1588: nakṣatrāṇi nakṣatrairvidyudetāvatī vai dīptirasmiṃśca loke'muṣmiṃśca sarvā haitāṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1589: dīptiṃ dīpyate'smiṃśca loke'muṣmiṃśca ya evaṃ veda 10.6.3.[1]
GV03sb_10_u:1591: satyam brahmetyupāsīta atha khalu kratumayo'yam puruṣaḥ sa
GV03sb_10_u:1596: manojavasaṃ satyasaṃkalpaṃ satyadhṛtiṃ sarvagandhaṃ sarvarasaṃ sarvā anu diśaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:1597: prabhūtaṃ sarvamidamabhyāptamavākkamanādaraṃ yathā vrīhirvā yavo vā śyāmāko
GV03sb_10_u:1600: bhūtebhyaḥ sa prāṇasyātmaiṣa ma ātmaitamita ātmānam pretyābhisambhaviṣyāmīti
GV03sb_10_u:1601: yasya syādaddhā na vicikitsāstīti ha smāha śāṇḍilya evametaditi 10.6.4.[1]
GV03sb_10_u:1603: uṣā vā aśvasya medhyasya śiraḥ sūryaścakṣurvātaḥ prāṇo vyāttamagnirvaiśvānaraḥ
GV03sb_10_u:1605: pājasyaṃ diśaḥ pārśve avāntaradiśaḥ parśava ṛtavo'ṅgāni māsāścārdhamāsāśca
GV03sb_10_u:1606: parvāṇyahorātrāṇi pratiṣṭhā nakṣatrāṇyasthīni nabho māṃsānyūvadhyaṃ sikatāḥ
GV03sb_10_u:1607: sindhavo gudā yakṛcca klomānaśca parvatā oṣadhayaśca vanaspatayaśca
GV03sb_10_u:1609: yadvidhūnute tatstanayati yanmehati tadvarṣati vāgevāsya vāgaharvā aśvam
GV03sb_10_u:1611: paścānmahimānvajāyata tasyāpare samudre yoniretau vā aśvam mahimānāvabhitaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:1615: naiveha kiṃ canāgra āsīt mṛtyunaivedamāvṛtamāsīdaśanāyayāśanāyā hi
GV03sb_10_u:1617: me kamabhūditi tadevārkyasyārkatvaṃ kaṃ ha vā asmai bhavati ya
GV03sb_10_u:1620: āpo vā arkaḥ tadyadapāṃ śara āsīttatsamahanyata sā
GV03sb_10_u:1621: pṛthivyabhavattasyāmaśrāmyattasya śrāntasya taptasya tejo raso niravartatāgniḥ 10.6.5.[3]
GV03sb_10_u:1623: sa tredhātmānaṃ vyakuruta ādityaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vāyuṃ tṛtīyaṃ sa eṣa
GV03sb_10_u:1624: prāṇastredhāvihitastasya prācī dikśiro'sau cāsau cermāvathāsya pratīcī dikpucamasau
GV03sb_10_u:1625: cāsau ca sakthyau dakṣiṇā codīcī ca pārśve
GV03sb_10_u:1626: dyauṣpṛṣṭhamantarikṣamudaramiyamuraḥ sa eṣo'psu pratiṣṭhito yatra kva caiti
GV03sb_10_u:1629: so'kāmayata dvitīyo ma ātmā jāyeteti sa manasā vācam mithunaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1630: samabhavadaśanāyām mṛtyustadyadreta āsītsa saṃvatsaro'bhavanna ha purā tataḥ
GV03sb_10_u:1634: sa aikṣata yadi vā imamabhimaṃsye kanīyo'nnaṃ kariṣya iti sa tayā vācā
GV03sb_10_u:1635: tenātmanedaṃ sarvamasṛjata yadidaṃ kiṃ carco yajūṃṣi sāmāni candāṃsi
GV03sb_10_u:1636: yajñānprajām paśūntsa yadyadevāsṛjata tattadattumadhriyata sarvaṃ vā attīti
GV03sb_10_u:1637: tadaditeradititvaṃ sarvasyāttā bhavati sarvamasyānnam bhavati ya
GV03sb_10_u:1640: so'kāmayata bhūyasā yajñena bhūyo yajeyeti so'śrāmyatsa tapo'tapyata tasya śrāntasya
GV03sb_10_u:1641: taptasya yaśo vīryamudakrāmatprāṇā vai yaśo vīryaṃ tatprāṇeṣūtkrānteṣu śarīraṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1642: śvayitumadhriyata tasya śarīra eva mana āsīt 10.6.5.[7]
GV03sb_10_u:1644: so'kāmayata medhyaṃ ma idaṃ syādātmanvyanena syāmiti tato'śvaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:1646: vā aśvamedhaṃ veda ya enamevaṃ veda 10.6.5.[8]
GV03sb_10_u:1651: eṣa vā aśvamedho ya eṣa tapati tasya saṃvatsara ātmāyamagnirarkastasyeme lokā
GV03sb_10_u:1652: ātmānastāvetāvarkāmedhau so punarekaiva devatā bhavati mṛtyurevāpa punarmṛtyuṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1653: jayati nainam mṛtyurāpnoti mṛtyurasyātmā bhavati sarvamāyuretyetāsāṃ
